111.content:
You are in a secret room, hidden by a secret door in your basement. You are quietly laughing to yourself as you work on your latest chemical concoction, one that will temporarily change you into a living toy doll. Only, you know that your sister does not have any boy dolls so you make the serum so that it will also temporarily change your gender as well.

You intend to use the formula so you can sneak into your sisters room and raise havoc with her. You will maintain your own strength and speed but at a doll's size.

"Of course, there are certain risks involved in this little raid." you think to yourself. "She is a practitioner of Black Magic, which means she could, in theory, change the conditions of my transformation and have her fun with me for violating her personal space."

You smile to yourself. "But then, without risk, this would not be fun!"


You take the finished serum and leave your secret laboratory to the basement. Form there, you walk upstairs and down one hall to the door of your sister's bedroom. You push the door open ajar and then drink the serum.

Instantly, you start to change. Two round orbs appear on your chest and grow into an ample pair of breasts as your male organ vanishes becoming nothing but skin. Fortunately for you, dolls are not anatomically correct. Your hips push outward, making your bottom more profound, while your face becomes feminine and your hair turns blond and grows down to your waist. Then rest of your body conforms to the shape of a woman. Finally, your skin turns silky smooth as your body begins to quickly shrink.

Before you get too small, you reach into your jeans and retrieve a tiny remote. You press a button and your clothing vanishes, taking the remote with them. Soon, you are in the form of a six inch naked woman bu the changes are not yet done. Your skin turns to plastic and rubber, making you the perfect living doll.

You look at your new form and giggle in a high, feminine voice.

"It worked!" you laugh. "It worked."

Now, on to your mischief. You enter the room and...

1111.content:
You decided to change back into human form and play a more sinister trick on your sister. You where laying on her bed, waiting for her when she entered the bedroom. She was instantly annoyed, seeing you on her bed. Clearly, she was very angry that you had invaded her personal space.

"What are you doing in my room, you mad science nerd!?!" she asked, angry.

"I made you a little something." you said, smiling mischievously. "I wanted to surprise you with it."

with that, you quickly aimed a gun like device at her and pulled the trigger. An eerie green light shot from it and zapped your sister before she could react.

"What did you hit me with, you whacked out weirdo!?!" screamed Chris, alarmed.

"You think I'm a nerd?" you asked, laughing. "Just wait. That ray I hit you with will physically transform you and your clothes into that of a 'real' nerd!" you laughed again. "For one hour, you know what a nerd looks and sounds like by just gazing into the mirror!"

Chris turned red with anger for a moment then suddenly gave you the same mischievous smile. "Oh really?" she asked. "Well, hows this for a twist?" she then said something in Latin, waving her hand at you. "I just cast a spell on you that will make you receive the same fate! Change me back and I will reverse my spell!"

Before another word could be said, you both began to feel strange, the transformation had begun. It started with yours and Chis' shoes. you looked down to see your shoes ahd changed from string tie to Velcro. Yours were white with the TMNT logo on them while Chris' shoes were black with the Pokemon logo. You turned to her and she crossed her arms, tapping her foot.

"I'm waiting." she said.

Upon reaching your laboratory, you took the necessary counter agent to return yourself to normal. As your mind cleared, it became obvious that transforming each other into geeks had an adverse effect on your and Chris' mind. It was clear that you had nearly made a huge mistake. There was an unspoken rule between you and your sister, mom and dad can never learn of your pranks on your sister or hers on you.

Was Chris wise enough to counter the transformation?
111111222.title: Unspoken rule.

1111112221.content:
Just then, Chris entered your laboratory, returned to normal but looking very shaken. For what seemed like an eternity, you and she stared at each other in silence. Finally, Chris spoke.

"My God, Juan!!" she whispered, trembling. "We could have killed each other, what happened!?"

You were silent for a moment, knowing that you and Chis never used the other's full name unless you were very angry or upset about something. Finally, you slowly shook your head, trembling as well. "I'm not entirely certain, Christina." you replied, honestly. "Something occurred when we increased our level of power against each other. Perhaps we went beyond our comfort zones and triggered some sort of hormonal response."

"A hormonal response?" asked Chris with a impatient look. "What kind of theory is that!?"

"Do you have a better explanation as to why we suddenly wanted to annihilate one another?" you asked, calmly. "We may have incredible powers in the eyes of 'normal' people but we too fall to the power of our own hormones and the primitive instincts that drive us all."

Chris sighed. "You might be on to something." she said. "But I have a feeling that it's more than just that."

"You sensed something?" you asked.

Chris nodded. "I sensed..."
1111112221.title: Yes, peace is restored.

11111122212.content:
Chris nodded. "I sensed.... our powers mixing for a brief moment, just before I lost control of myself." she said. "It is not a good idea to mix 'any' magics, regardless if they science based or witchcraft."

"Magic can fight science and the other way around without any issues." you mussed. "However, mixing the two always leads to disaster. I can only speculate that when our powers briefly mixed, it overloaded the Cerebral Cortex of our brains, creating a primitive response that was undetectable by our conscious awareness until we revered the transformation and thusly repairing the effects of the mixed magic spawned alteration."

Chris shook her head, looking confused. "Say what?"

You sighed. "By mixing magics, we accidentally blew a fuse in our heads and went nuts for a while."

Chris turned red. "Don't patronize me." she said. "Just explain things as you do at school and we won't have these issues."

"Point taken." you said. "Sorry, I just feel more comfortable being myself around you."

Suddenly, Chris smiled. "Oh, I totally, for sure, get your jive, man!" she said. "You all into the techno talk and whatever I try to to get jiggy with your lingo but its like so out of my comfort zone its in left field. Do you dig me?"

Now it was your turn to be confused. "Huh?"

Chris nodded. "Its a language I use with a few witches to discuss business when normal people are around." she said. "Not too many 'normals' understand it and those who do all think we're just messing around."

"I guess there is a lot we need to learn about each other." you said, blushing slightly. "I suggest we hold up on your 'fun and games' until we can fine tune our powers so they do not accidentally mix again."

Chris nodded. "I agree."
11111122212.title: Our powers mixing.

Chris grows Jan's muscles during soccer practice
111111222121.content:
You walked past Chris’ bedroom and you gently knocked on her door.

“Come in!”

“Hey, Chris…. I’m really sorry about what happened earlier” you say to your sister. “Mom was also really mad at me and made me apologize to you…”

“Well, it was also my fault, so I guess I’m also responsible for letting things getting out of hand…” Chris said sheepishly. “So… Do you forgive me, bro?”

“Of course! Here… Give me a hug!” I said to Chris, as I walked up to her. She was sitting on her bed, reading a big old spell book. She set the book aside and got up, embracing me with both arms. After a moment of hugging one another, she let go of me and sat down on her bed.

“I’ll make it up to you, bro!” she said to me. “I won’t mess with you mentally, but I’ll just change you physically from now on!”

“Physically?”

“Yeah! But, don’t worry! I’ll do something that you’ll really like this time!” she assured me.

“Uhh… I’m not so sure that you’re capable of casting a spell on me that I’ll actually like…” I sighed as I rolled my eyes. “What do you plan to do to me?”

“Well… Every morning, when you get up, you always admire yourself in your mirror…”

“Yeah… So?”

“I will cast a spell on you to make you a little more… attractive to the girls at school! How does that sound?” she said with a grin on her face.

“Jeez sis… That would be really nice for a change!” I laughed.

“Trust me, you’ll love it!” she said, as she grabbed a notebook out of her backpack and started jotting down a few verses out of the old spell book which lay on the bed before her.

“You promise me that you’re not going to cast any spell on me that will hurt me, right?”

“I promise!”

“Okay then… I’ll take your word for it, sis!” I said to Chris as I got up and walked out of the bedroom, closing the door behind me.

I went into my room and started reading a book for school until I became sleepy and dozed off in bed.

A few minutes after I had fallen asleep, Chris came into my bedroom, holding a small rubber balloon which was completely deflated. She held the balloon in one hand, and a piece of paper in the other. As she held the balloon in her hand, she pressed the balloon up against my chest while I slept, reading several verses out loud which were written on the sheet of paper. By doing this, she had enchanted the balloon and cast a spell on me; binding the size of my muscles to the size of the balloon, which she held in her hand. The little red balloon was now ready for action but I didn’t know it, since I was sound asleep!

When I got up the following morning, I walked over to the full-body mirror and admired my reflection as I took the time to slowly wake up from my slumber. While I was standing there with my back facing the door, Chris had quietly opened the bedroom door, and observed what I was doing. It was then that she placed the spout of the enchanted balloon between her lips, and she gently started blowing air into the small, rubber object.

At the exact same moment that she blew air into the balloon, I felt a slight tingling sensation all over my body, specifically over every single muscle! Then, out of the blue, every muscle on my body began to inflate! It was just as if the balloon was inflating my muscles with more muscle at the same time as Chris was blowing air into the balloon which she was holding in her hand!

“Whoa! What’s happening?” I gasped, as I noted my biceps grow bigger, my pectorals become rounder and my calves bulge out, all at the same time! Not only that, but I was overcome by an increased surge of physical strength which felt awesome!

“You just gained a few more pounds of muscle, bro!” Chris laughed, as she showed the balloon in her hand. “All thanks to this!!”

I couldn’t believe it! My muscles were being inflated… by a balloon! I had to admit that this spell was certainly among the coolest ones my sister had ever come up with. The question was… When and where was my sister going to use this on me?

1111112221211.content:
As I wandered through the long, wide hallways of my middle school, a wide grin formed on my face when I spotted her: the girl who had caught my eye ever since the start of the semester: Julie. Julie Powell was short and slender, with blue eyes and long black hair, knotted together in a pony tail. She was always happy and smiling, and she greeted every student who walked past her, including me.

“Hi…” she said to me, as she walked up to me and stopped.

Boy… My heart just melted right there and I was left speechless for a moment. Then, I felt something else going on in my body. Was I nervous? Yes. Was I anxious? Definitely. Then there was this weird tingling sensation in… my muscles? Just as I was talking to her?

“Hey Julie…” I said to her, as I cleared my throat.

“How’s going, Jan?” she asked with a grin.

I was about to answer when I spotted another familiar figure in the corner of my eye, standing a few feet away from me, holding a balloon in her hand: my sister Chris.

“I’m doing alright, Julie… How about you? How are your ---“ I was about to ask her, when I felt my chest inflate, my biceps bulge, my calves grow bigger and my thighs become wider. My shirt and jeans were feeling incredibly tight as my muscles pushed all my clothes to the limit before the growth came to an abrupt halt, much to my relief.

“How are my… What?” she asked in a sweet voice.

“How are you classes going?”

“Oh, they’re just fine! I really like my teachers! Except for Mr. Johnson. He’s kinda strict, but that’s okay…” she replied. “So… How’ve you been?”

“I’m alright… Just busy with classes and playing soccer…” I answered.

“Cool! You look great!” she grinned, as she ran her finger over my bulging chest. “Have you been working out?”

“Uhh… Working out?”

“Yeah! You look like you just bulked up while you were standing here talking to me! You’re so big and buff! I kinda… like it…” she purred.

“Oh! Well… Umm…” I stuttered shyly. “I-I g-g-guess you can say that… Y-y-you know…”

“You’re so humble! I like that in a man…” she smiled.

Just then the bell rang loudly, indicating the start of the next period.

“I gotta go to class. I’ll talk to ya later, big Jan!” she whispered to me.

“See you later!”

She walked away, leaving me with butterflies in my stomach, while my sister was laughing in the corner while holding the inflated balloon in her hand. I guess I needed to come up with something to make her more attractive as well. In the meantime, I didn’t mind her inflate my muscles. It was kinda fun…
1111112221211.title: Chris grows Jan's muscles at school

1111112221212.content:
You had taken up soccer more as an excuse to meet with other young mad scientists in your school, practice was when you had all of your meetings so not to arouse suspicions within their families or school. Your team, thus far was undefeated but it was not due to cheating through your mad science skills, it was all from team work and much practice.

"Chris cast a spell on me that would expand my muscles at her command with the use of a simple balloon." you said to your friend and fellow mad scientist, Sam Bowers. "It was a sort of peace offering after we nearly went too far."

"Interesting." said, Sam. "any pain involved in this physical alteration?"

"None." you replied, kicking him the ball. "Just a slight tingling sensation, the magic doing its job, I suppose."

Sam was about your age with dust blond hair and blue eyes. He had a perfect body, scientifically speaking, with muscles one would not expect to see on one who dedicates his life to the study of the forbidden sciences (mad science). He kicked the ball towards another player.

"What will your contribution be to this cease fire in your relationship with your sibling?" he asked, helping to cover the player with the ball. "I know your profile, Jan, you always attempt to out do your sister."

"It will all depend upon on how she intends to use this new spell on me." you replied. "For the time being, I am giving her the benefit of the doubt as she has not attempted to 'pump me up' at any inappropriate time."

Sam chuckled. "Interesting analogy." he said.

Just then the ball was kicked to you and you moved to make a goal. Only the goalie on the other team was Frederic Jones, a young mad scientist with longish red hair and green eyes. He was not particularly strong, thus he had no quips about cheating to get what he wanted. In this case, it was to win the game and you knew that he would cheat to block your kick as it would end the game with your team the victor. Fortunately, so did Chris.

"Okay, Fred." she whispered, raising the balloon to her lips. "Let's see how you like the game turned against you."

With that, she blew into the enchanted balloon and your muscles bulked immediately with no pain, just a mild tingling sensation but you were too involved in the practice game to notice. You kicked the ball as Fredric used a telekinetic shield to black it.

"That's cheating!" called Sam. "Foul!"

"Who cares?" asked Fredric. "Its only practice and besides..."

His words died in his throat as he saw your muscles suddenly bulge and kicked the soccer ball with enough force to make it sound like a sonic boom. The ball had been treated with a special covering so that it would take greater punishment and it crashed through Fredric's shield as if it were not there, making the winning goal.

"Physical alteration is cheating!" yelled Fredric. "That point did not count!"

"What physical alteration?" you asked, having returned to normal. "Besides, you cheated yourself with that telekinetic shield around the goal. That makes the kick fair as I became no stronger than Samuel."

Sam grinned. "He has a point, fellow colleague." he said. "This game is ours." he then gave Fredric a one handed hug. "We're on the same team, let it go and see this as a lesson... cheating will always get you in the end."

"A lesson well learned." said Chris.

As you left practice, you wondered what you could do for Chris.

Witches in particular have it rough, since guys don't have to deal with girl haters. Chris has more than once been targeted by such jerks, and more than once nearly taught them an instant lesson.

There were a number of students who had rubbed Chris the wrong way, most of them were girl haters. You wanted to target the one who tormented her the most. Of course, you were not going to to do anything that would expose you or her but what you had in mind would make him think twice before tormenting her again. You and Sam talked to her during lunch, her reaction was not what you had expected.

"Are you both insane!?" she hissed, quietly. "I could have targeted that jerk myself, if it were permitted, but it is not."

"We're not going to do anything drastic, Chris." whispered Sam, defensively. "Just a slightly cruel prank that will make him think twice before targeting you again."

"We just switch his milk for one that had been given an added mixture that will cause him to talk like an idiot for a while." you said, explaining. "It only lasts for a few hours with no side effects except for an unexplainable fear of you."

Chris shook her head. "I don't like it." she said. "I'll grant you the babbling serum would be funny but leave out the fear factor, it could come back to haunt us."

"Done." said Sam. "Name your target."

Chris sighed. I know I'm going to regret this. "They are Russ Creek and Joe Sand, both fifteen." she replied, finally. "They are the worst girl haters in school, bullies that only target girls.." she paused. "Please promise me you won't do anything crazy. I know you mad scientists all to well."

You and Sam chuckled.

Later that day, during lunch...
111111222121221.title: Ask Chris who she hates the most

1111112221212212.content:
As you and Sam were walking towards the cafeteria, you saw Russ Creek, a muscular boy with crew cut brown hair and brown eyes push a small girl from your class into the girls' room, holding a roll of duct tape. You knew the girl Kim Walker, a shy girl of about thirteen with long blond hair and blue eyes. "Forget the switch." you whispered to Sam. "I have a much better idea in mind."

Sam followed you into the girl's bathroom where you found Russ trying to duct tape Kim's uniform skirt up, exposing her panties for all to see. This enraged you and, before you knew what you were doing, you grabbed him and roughly pushed him against the wall with one hand! Kim opened her mouth to scream but Sam mentally blocked the sound from being formed and quickly walked up to her. "We'll deal with this jerk." he said quietly. "Get out of here and bring the student police back with you."

"Won't you get in trouble too?" asked Kim, worried.

"We'll be long gone before you get back." you replied, still holding a struggling Russ. "Just go, you don't want to see what we plan to do to him."

Kim, fearing the worst, ran out of the bathroom and started screaming. "We have to work fast, man." you said, once she was gone. "Let's have him 'stick' around for a while."

Sam grinned, knowing that you had planned and helped as the two of you securely duck tapped his wrists, ankles, and waist to the wall before gagging him with the tape as well. Once that was done, you turned the duck ape pink and began to tightly wrap his shorts in it, making it appear to be a pink pair of bloomers.

"Nice touch, man." chuckled Sam.

"I'm not done yet." you said, smiling.

You then pulled the bottom of Russ' shirt into the top and pulled it down before wrapping it all with the pink duck tape, making it look like a pink bra. "Now I'm done." you said. "Let's make ourselves scarce."

Sam nodded and the two of you ran out of sight of Russ before vanishing at the door just as Kim and two fifteen year old girls rushed in, looking angry. Only as they saw what had happened to the known girl hater, they burst into laughter.

"Who ever did this must have worked fast, Janet." said one red headed, muscular girl, shaking her head. "I say he got what he deserved."

"True, Vanessa." said Janet, a black haired giant of a girl. "Only we can't have vigilantes in our school." she turned to Kim. "Do you know that two boys who did this?"

"I... I didn't get a good look at them." lied Kim. "The second one forced Russ to release me, I ran off."

"Okay, Kim." said Janet. "You may go."

Elsewhere, you and Sam were quietly laughing over what you had done to Russ when Chris walked over with her cellphone in hand. she had a serious look on her face but you could not determine her mood as she said, "It's for you."

Nervously, you took the phone and put it to your ear. "This is Juan." you said.

Who was on the other line?
1111112221212212.title: You do something else.

choices: You are confronted by a strange man.
11111122212122122.content:
"Juan Jane Smith!" yelled mom's annoyed voice over the telephone. "You know I forbid any use of magic or super science at school, why did you disobey my rule!?"

"I only used my power to change the color of the duck tape I had confiscated from Russ Creek." you replied, quietly, defending yourself. "He did not see the change and no one witnessed us taping the jerk to girls' bathroom wall."

"Except for Russ Creek!" yelled mom. "Did you remember to remove the incident from his mind!?"

You gulped, knowing that you had not as mom continued to scold you. "Your silence tells me that you did not." she said. "Fortunately for you, I had Chris watching you today as I sensed you were in a vindictive mood this morning. I can not pass judgment on your friend, Sam but you can assure him that his mother will get a phone call from me today."

"I managed to remove the incident from his memory before he spilled his guts to the student police." said Chris. "However, I did tell them that you and Sam had a fight with Russ earlier today, they will be questioning you two, have a story ready."

You and Sam paled slightly as mom then spoke again though the phone. "When you get home, you can expect a riot act from your father, young man." she said, sternly. "We will determine your punishment tonight but I am leaning towards you wearing skirts for a while."

With that, the line went dead and you handed the phone back to Chris who gave you a rueful smile. "The student police don't know a thing." she said, quietly. "I only said that so you and Sam have time to get your stories straight before you go home to be punished for open use of your powers."

"Thanks, sis." you said. "I guess we went too far on that one."

Chris giggled. "It was worth it, just to see the look on Russ' face."

You and Sam giggled with her.

Later...
11111122212122122.title: Mom, scolding you.

Mom was waiting for you, still looking angry. Chris was nervous, and pleading for her to be leniant. Worse, your friend Sarah was standing next to chris. What is she doing here? you wondered, since she is not caught up in this madness.... yet. Least Sam was behind you, though you think he is there to plead for mom not to call his parents.

"Hi Jan. Why is your mom looking like she is on the warpath?" Sarah asked.

"Thats because Jan.. misbehaved at school" mom said. She had a strange green light and you see she is using some sort of trance magic on Sarah. "What do you know about the supernatural?"

"Sam has superpowers? What exactly is this power?"

"Super science. But..."

"Magic is better" Chris interuptted.

"Kids. I don't need this arguement. Anyway it was these two that put that Russ Creek in his situation."

111111222121221221.title: Your punishment.

1111112221212212212.content:
Mom gave you a mischievous smile as she pulled out the frilly pink princess dress with heart spotted white tights and black mary jane shoes. "I would never do anything to deliberately harm you, Jan." she said. "However, you took a big risk using your talents in a public place, you have to be punished." she smiled. "Your magic lessons start tomorrow."

You screamed, seeing the room rapidly becoming larger then winced as you felt your insides changing just as quickly. Within a minute, a small seven year old girl stood where you once were in oversized boys' clothing. "No!" you screamed, suddenly crying. "Mom, you can't be serious about teaching me magic! If the dormant magic in me takes root..."

Mom sighed, knowing well that what she was doing to you was a punishment devised by mad scientists, hence one of the many reasons they were called 'mad'. Unknown to you, there was a war between witches and mad scientists that lasted for centuries, ending in a cease fire a few months before the end of the cold war in 1989. It was during this war and to that date mad scientists considered witchifaction to be a nightmare and an insult. "You need to vanish for a few days until your father and I are certain this mess you made has been cleaned up." said mom, sternly. "There are reasons why you must not use your powers in public!" she sighed. "Don't be too depressed, you'll be having some company."

Chris paled, seeing herself shrink as well. "Mom! NO!" she screamed, tearfully. "What did I do!?"

"You used your powers to increase Jan's strength during a soccer game!" scolded mom, pulling a small boy's outfit out of the box. "This gave him an unfair advantage, another mess we have to clean up!" she paused to calm herself. "Your mad science training starts tomorrow."

Chris sobbed, seeing her now male self as mom gave her the outfit and you the dress. As of now, you are my adorable seven year old twins, Janna and Christopher."

Albeit reluctantly, you and Chris made your way up the stairs to your new bedrooms to change clothes...

Apparently this was quite popular in the 1950's, only for this sort of punishment to die down in 1962...."

1111112221212212212112.content:
"You're lucky I caught you instead of Mrs S." scolding you, Sarah said. "She has decided that Chris needs to learn control and has sent her to Spell-blossom all girls boarding school."

"Where!?" you asked, sitting up.

"All I know is that Mrs S said it was the sister school to Witchbloom." said Sarah, tiredly. "Mr S said you are going to a different school in a few days."

"Terrific!" you muttered, falling back into a lying position. "I can hardly wait."

Just as your mood was about to turn sour, your television turned on by itself, showing the news only it was a man in a lab coat instead of the usual anchorman. This caught your attention immediately as it was the way mad scientists sent news around the world in a hurry, by pirating the television signals.

'This just in, Spell-blossom all girls boarding school is under siege by rogue witches, claiming the right to teach young witches the 'true' lessons of magic." announced the anchorman. "The rogue hunters, witch police and the hunters elite are at the scene but all fear that this incident may lead to casualties."

You gasped, hearing that. "Christina!"

"Elvira, the head witch has issued a plea to the mad scientist world... 'There is no need for scientific might, we the witching world will deal with this crisis'."

With that, the television turned itself off, leaving you to decide what to do. "I'll be in my lab." you said, getting up.

"Mrs S told me you were to stay in bed!" pleading, Sarah said. "Please, I don't want to use the potion Mrs S left me to keep you in line!"

You waved your hand in front of Sarah, your eyes looking deep into her own. "Sleep..." you said, your voice echoing.

Sarah was powerless against your 'event', or technological spell, and fell into your arms, fast asleep. You picked her up then carried her to the living room where you placed her onto the couch. "Sorry, Sarah but I will not sit idol while my sister is in danger." you said, covering her in a blanket for comfort. "Sleep well."

Once you were certain Sarah would be comfortable, you ran down to your basement laboratory where you first took a counter agent for the spell, returning yourself to normal. You began to turn dials, pull levers, and work keyboards. Finally, you hit a switch on a screen to find an image of Sam, back to his normal self as well. "Did you hear of the siege on Spell-blossom school?" he asked. "My sister just got sent there."

"I thought she was too young to work magic." you said, worried.

"Apparently she has a talent." frowning, Sam replied. "She's only seven, I have to do something."

"Call the other mad scientists in the area." after a thought, you said. "We'll form a collective and take the school back for the witches. If the witch students are smart, they'll rise up and help us kick those rogue bitches out!"

"Agreed." replied Sam, serious. "When do you plan to make the move?"

"Just as soon as we are all ready." equally serious, you replied. "We must move fast before they can fortify themselves."

Unknown to you, in a large house miles away, a tall woman with red hair and fire hazel eyes giggled as she motioned for another woman to turn off some camera equipment. "That should light the spark, Samantha." she said, smiling. "Now all we need to do is kick back and watch the fireworks."

"This should be interesting Lilly." giggled Samantha. "We haven't started mischief this great since witch school."

That morning, Tonya Powers, a tall and slender twenty three year old woman with waist length black hair and blue eyes looked out a window to greet the rising sun only to gasp. There were nearly thirty boys on technological broomsticks, all bearing their armaments, moving swiftly to the school!

"Oh my." she whispered. "Those boys..."
1111112221212212212112.title: Under siege.

11111122212122122121121.content:
Tonya, knowing she only had seconds, sounded the alarm. Bells and whistles echoed through every hall, moving the students to run for their dorms with their teachers keeping a protective watch over them. Chris was in the rear, holding the hand of a seven year old girl with blond hair and blue eyes. "What's going on, Chris?" worried, Kayley asked. "Why are we being sent back to our rooms?"

"It's just a drill, Kayley." forcing a smile, Chris replied. "Like the fire drills at your other school."

"Oh, is that all?" relieved, Kayley asked. "I was worried."

Chris giggled, hiding her worry as she spotted the mad scientists flying above her on their tech-brooms. "Is this a test or are we really under attack by psychotic scientists?" concerned, she thought. "I'm glad Jan isn't here, he'd be flying up there to intercept them by now."

In another part of the school, Tonya walked into an office where a tall elderly woman with white streaked black hair and sharp hazel eyes. "Delora Dorsey, a number of young mad scientists are approaching with their weapons at the ready!" urgently, she said. "They will have the school surrounded any second!"

Delora Dorsey was the second in command of the witching world and a trusted friend of Elvira Strange. "Calm yourself, my dear child." softly, she said. "If it was their intention to do us harm, they would have already attacked." she stood from her chair, revealing her slender but firm form. "The boys believe they are on a rescue mission, I believe this is a prime opportunity to run a witch test on a grand scale."

"Madam second, you can't serious!" stunned, Tonya said, using Delora's title. "Those boys are called 'mad' scientists for a very good reason!"

"We are called witches for a very good reason." countered Delora. "They are the brothers of the girls they believe are in danger here. The students need to see that, even though they are at odds, their siblings care and will lay down their lives to protect them."

"What are we to do?" nervous, Tonya asked.

"Work this as an attack drill." instructing, Delora said. "Only allow them to gain ground. Once they make it onto school grounds, we will reveal the truth to them and the students."

"What of Forester and Sweetie who started this?" frowning, Tonya asked.

Delora smiled. "Do not worry, madam head witch has that handled." she said.
11111122212122122121121.title: don't know the broadcast was a fake!

choices: she must be telling the truth.
111111222121221221211212.content:
You signaled the others to commence the rescue operation and dove down with Sam following to take your target, the main gate of the school so those who do not wish to be involved may run to freedom and safety. "For the alliance!" firing two missiles, you declared. "Hora!"

Two witches, standing guard at the gates, screamed and dove aside as your missiles destroyed the gates, leaving them wide open as you and Sam flew passed. As they got back to their feet, the gasped, seeing the other gates being blown open as well. "Mayday!" yelling into a radio, the first witch said. "We are under attack!"

"Mad scientist boys have Spell-blossom school under siege!" frantic, the second witch radioed. "Assistance required!"

As you had suspected, the rogue witches, holding the school hostage gave heavy resistance, firing spells and power blasts in your and the other mad scientists' directions. You dodged those you could and allowed your shields to handle the rest as you fired your stun rounds, wanting as little casualties as possible. "Teams two and three, secure the dorm buildings!" radioing the others, you quickly ordered. "Team one, with me! Take out the rogue resistance!"

You winced, hearing the screams of girls and women alike, hoping to find Chris unharmed. "Be strong for me, sis." tearing up, you thought. "I'm here to save you!"

It was then you saw her. She was being pushed towards one of the dorm buildings, along with who you recognized as Sam's little sister, by a tall woman with red hair and green eyes. Had you known they were in no danger, you would have avoided the school like the plague. However, to you, this was real.

"Please tell me this is just a test, Miss Gina." frightened, Chris said.

Gina Fortune, a tall woman with red hair and green eyes sighed. "I wish I could tell you, Chris." hiding her fear, she said. "I was not told anything of such a test so, if it is, the test is on all of us."

She urged Chris to continue moving quickly but winced as her firm push had inadvertently caused her to trip. Chris cried out in pain as she landed, full weight, onto one knee. "Sorry." said Gina.

In the air, you saw the woman push Chris and felt your blood boil as she fell to the ground, crying out in what could only be pain as the woman then grabbed her arm. "That's my sister, you bitch!" furious, you screamed.

Before Gina could react, you had grabbed her by the collar of her blouse and flew up with her screaming as Chris could do nothing but watch in utter disbelief. "Why- Why are you attacking this school!?" fearful, Gina asked.

"We will not tolerate any attacks on our siblings!" angry, you replied. "Especially not from rogues!"

"This school is not under rogue control!" stunned, Gina said. "What on Earth gave you such an idea!?"

That threw you off guard and you dropped Gina onto a flat roof. "The mad sci broadcast system." eying her, you said. "We all heard the broadcast, stating that Spell-blossom school was under rogue control."

"The false transmission." stunned, Gina thought. "Now it makes sense, they think its real!"

"That report was fraudulent, young man." sternly, Gina said. "It was nothing more than a prank, intended to stir up trouble, though I fear they did not expect this."

You turned your head to one side, calculating the odds that she might be telling the truth. After a moment, you decide...
111111222121221221211212.title: Tests need preperation.

1111112221212212212112122.content:
For a moment, you stared at Gina, struggling with your heart and mind. "I want to believe her." biting your lip, you thought. "Only I have been told that a rogue witch will say or do anything to gain the advantage."

Gina stared up at you, uncertain but not daring to show it. "I want to think I am getting through to him."she thought, holding herself together. "Only, I heard that mad scientists are a real stubborn lot."

Finally, you spoke, causing Gina to sigh in relief. "I will look further into this." coldly, you said. "If you are attempting to deceive me..."

You did not finish your threat as you really did not wish to threaten anyone... yet. Instead, you dived down, leaving Gina on the high roof and came to a stop where Chris was to find her hobbling down a hall with a small girl doing her best to help. "Chris, wait!" jumping off your broom, you yelled. "I need to get you out of here!"

"Jan?" turning around, Chris asked. "You- You heard of the attack?"

You nodded, thinking Gina was lying. "We all did." hugging her, you replied. "Fear not, though. We will purge this school of the rogue infestation and return it to the peace it once knew."

Chris looked at you as if you had lost your mind. "What rogue infestation?" shaking her head, she asked. "Where did you get that nonsense!?"

Now you were beginning to see that Gina was telling the truth and produced a small disk, which activated a hologram projection of the mad sci alert system, reporting the school being under siege by rogue witches. Chris' jaw dropped in shock, seeing how everything had exploded into the current situation. "A false transmission. Now it makes sense." turning pale, she thought. "If witch channel zero had reported a psychotic scientist attack on Eligere Sententia, I might have gathered my witch friends for a rescue mission."

"Chris, if we were deceived into this attack, it will look very bad for my rescue team." morbidly, you said.

"The only guilty one here is an overzealous second in command." calmly, a booming voice replied. "The broadcast center was taken over by two quasi rogues who sent a false report, starting this drama."

You turned to find the massive, muscular form of Devon Bizarre, the head scientist of the mad sci collective! "It is an honor to be in your presence, Lord Bizarre." bowing, you said.

"I fear we have no time for formalities, young man." strictly, Devon said. "The second in command of the witching world was informed of this broadcast." frowning, Devin added, "She handled it very poorly and we need to clean up the mess."

You nodded, hating the fact you were so easily deceived, and turned to your radio. "Cancel the attack, Lord Bizarre of the collective has the situation under control."

"Nice little speech, lad." smiling, Devon said. "Allow me to show you another approach."

With that, he rose his hand and snapped his fingers. There was a brilliant flash and, when your sight returned, every member of your rescue team were standing in a circle in the school courtyard. They each looked stunned as a number of witches arrived on brooms. Among them was an elderly but tall and well built woman with long black hair and steel green eyes. Seeing her, you immediately knew she was the head witch, Elvira Strange. "Greetings, dear brother." in a guarded tone, Elvira said as she landed. "I take it you have the situation under control."

"Greetings to you, dear sister." bowing, Devon replied. "The attack has been halted but I fear we must work together to deal with and control the aftermath"

Elvira nodded. "I agree."
1111112221212212212112122.title: Enter Devon Bizarre.

11111122212122122121121221.content:
"Fellow mad docs, (short for mad scientists), I applaud you for your swift action in this crisis, had it been a real crisis." turning to you and the other young mad docs, Devon said. "However, you should have confirmed the fact this school was under rogue control before acting. You were all too easily deceived into an act of aggression."

"What- What is our punishment?" nervously, you asked.

Devon shared a knowing smile with Elvira, no one taking note that he never touched the ground. He was hovering four feet above it, a technical 'no foul' under witch law. Immediately, every boy in your group tried to teleport out but that was prevented by an automatic lock down to protect the school during an attack to prevent reinforcements to aid the invading force. You and Sam, knowing that there was not enough time, sighed and changed yourselves into your own girl equivalent. Seeing you, both Devon and Elvira gave a silent nod but said nothing. Once the time was up, Elvira waved her hand and every boy passed out, changing into girls with suitable clothing. Being girls, you and Sam did not fall unconscious.

"You and 'Samantha' made the right choice." said Devon. "Therefore, you two will remain here for the year to learn magic with your sisters."

"Why are you exempt from the rule, Lord Bizarre?" asked Samantha, defiantly. "You are on school grounds as well."

Devon chuckled as Elvira giggled. "I was invited which automatically exempts me from that rule." he replied. "That, and I never set foot on witch school grounds.... observe."

You looked at Devon's feet and moaned, seeing that he was hovering above the ground. "Clever." you muttered.

"Experience, lass." smiling, Devon countered. "I too suffered this... inconvenience of gender reversal. Still, I gained more than I lost, walking in the shoes of my female self." nodding, he added, "So shall you and Samantha... Janna."

With that, both Devon and Elvira waved their hands together and the new girls vanished before you found yourself in a classroom, wearing the school uniform. Samantha stood next to you, uncertain as Gina stood with Chis and Kayley, all smiling at the two of you. "Welcome to Spell-Blossom witch school, Janna and Samantha." smiling, Gina said.

"You look cute... big sis." giggling, Kayley said.

"Look on the bright side, Janna." more comforting, Chris said. "At least we'll be together."

Yeah, I guess." down hearted, you said.

Unknown to all, in a vast laboratory somewhere, an unknown man had watched the events unfold through a big screen viewer with the use of a pirated spy satellite. He grunted, turning off the screen with a wave of his hand. The man was tall and muscular with short, sleek black hair and fire hazel eyes. His face was nearly perfect, minus a badly healed broken nose. He waved his hand at the screen again, revealing Lilly and Samantha inside a contemporary home somewhere. "Well played, Sweetie Lilly." startling both women, he said. "Toying with thirty boys at once is a new record for you and your 'pet'."

Inside the home, Samantha turned to a holographic likeness of the man, annoyed. "Careful, Olly Travers." turning red, she said. "Such a sharp tongue can cut your own throat." she shook her head. "You should have allowed us to make you 'Olivia' permanently... such a waste!"

Olly suddenly smiled. "Two can play at your game, girls." he said. "We shall see who comes out on top."

With that, he let out a maniacal laugh before the hologram vanished.

1111112221212212212112122111222.content:
Lilly sighed as she saw two familiar girls standing in front of her. She knew Karl and Greg's sisters, Tara and Daniel, they often visited her for tea, not knowing she was a witch. When they first met, she was feeling alone and they were running away from home. At first, Lilly was not sure what to make of them as they were nothing like their infamous brothers but she managed to convince them to return home to their families. Sure, it earned her some points but she felt she had gained more than that... true friendship.

"Damn, I wanted to make them toddler girl versions of themselves but I turned them into their sisters instead!" cursing, she thought. "Fortunately, it only lasts for a few hours."

Karl and Greg screamed, seeing themselves as their own sister and began to panic as their old clothing was too big for them now. Lilly was about to speak when two new voices were heard... "Oh my God!"

Lilly turned to see the real Tara and Daniel, staring at their new twin sisters in shock. Tara was a petite girl with long blond hair and sapphire green eyes. Daniel was slightly taller but just as thin with short cut brown hair and brown eyes.

"We heard rumors that you were some kind of a witch." stunned, Tara said. "We thought they weren't true."

"The rumors are... partially true." wincing, Lilly said. "I assure you, I'd never do anything to purposely harm anyone."

"Who- Who are these... copies of us?" stunned as well, Daniel asked.

"Tara, it's me, Karl!" blushing and in tears, Karl said. "Make this crazy lady change us back!"

"Please, Daniel!" sobbing, Greg said. "We thought this witch was holding you two hostage and..."

"Greg!?" surprised, Daniel asked. Greg nodded and Daniel giggled. "You look cute!"

"They'd be cuter in girls' clothing." giggled Tara. she turned to Lilly. "This is the best surprise ever!"

Greg and Karl began to openly cry, thinking they had been tricked into their situation. "Actually, someone I know played a mean trick on these two." said Lilly, smiling. "He gave them the impression that I was holding you two hostage in my home, they came here to rescue you in their... own way."

"You had to change them into little girls to pacify them." guessing, Tara said. she then smiled. "Well played, Ms S!"

"How long will they be this way?" asked Daniel, showing some worry.

"It all depends on them." shrugging, Lilly said. "They will be back to their normal selves once they calm down enough to have a restful sleep."

Tara and Daniel turned to each other, their eyes dancing before turning to their new sisters with shark like grins, making them shiver. "Well... Karla it seems as if we need to help you two relax." smiling, Tara said. "I think some new clothing and a makeover will help."

"No! No! No!" begging Karla said. "That won't help me relax!"

"Come along... Gina." ginning, Daniel said. "I am going to enjoy taking you shopping." she giggled, "I think we'll start with some nice dresses."

"No, please!" crying, Gina begged. "Don't make me!"

"It's too bad that spell included some 'passive' properties." grinning, Lilly thought. "They will be like putty in their sister's hands until they finally relax." then she said, "I could offer your new sisters some more appropriate clothing."

Tara and Daniel nodded and Lilly waved her hand, causing the boyish clothing to morph. Within seconds Karla and Gina were in matching pink dresses. "Have fun, girls." she said.

As Tara and Daniel lead their reluctant sisters out of the house, Lilly heard a giggle. "Well played, Lilly." said Elvira's voice. "It seems your one true friendship has strengthened."

1111112221212212212112122111222.title: A mistake strenghtens a friendship.

"Warning: this is not a drill! I repeat: this is not a drill! A rogue squadron of psychotic scientists has spotted bearing North-North-East to the Mana-mines!
