They appear armed and dangerous, approach with caution!" screamed Tonya Powers hysterically into her magical microphone which appeared to be nothing more than a sunflower growing from her dorm room garden flower pots. She had seen the group of boys flying, armed to the teeth with ray-guns and freeze-rays and had misinterpreted their intent as hostile...

Oblivious to the danger they had set upon themselves, you and Sam continued to lead your quickly gathered collective of mad-scientists to the Spell-blossom girl boarding school. Little did you know of the hornets nest you had stirred up by heading there on your mechanized broomsticks unannounced. Your Anti-Gravity Vehicle, or AGV was a sleek modified rocket engine Ural Land Ural Red October with a miniature twenty four missile rocket launcher, two ten millimeter anti-magic machine guns with magic shield piercing rounds, a zero inertia freeze cannon, and a blast wave concussion cannon... that was just on the side car. Sam was riding what looked like a rocket powered uni-ski with saddle straps in the middle and a teleportation/levitation weaponry summoning rack that allowed him to call upon any weapon he may desire in combat. The rag-tag collective of mad scientist boys apparently all had uniquely customized broomsticks, matching their specialized skills.

"So what's the occasion?" shouted Pierce, a newbie scientist, to Jan through the squealing wind.

"Use your mike, rookie!" scolding, Sam called through his mike.

"My sister, Christina! She's at the boarding school!" anxious, you replied. "I can't just leave her there among those rogue witches, who knows what they will do to her and the others!"

"What concerns me is that Spell Blossom is the home of the Hunters Elite, witch commandos." through his mike, Pierce said. "How did the rogues manage to get past them?" pausing, he added, "Also, didn't you hear about what the head witch, Elvira said, 'There is no need for scientific might, we the witching world will deal with this crisis'."

They were flying in a tight triangle cover formation but had to hoarse their voices just to be heard above the din, even though their communication mikes. The boys had colored goggles strapped across their eyes to prevent being blinded from insects flying past them.

"Doesn't matter!" determined, you said. "I'm not leaving my sister behind!"

"Dragons!" shrieked a terrified unbroken voice.

"The Hunters Elite..." gasped Sam, pulling his broom up and to a stop. "It's a trap!!"

Everyone's eyes widened, their pupils shrinking at the sight of their opponents. In front of the collective of boys swarmed two dozen Wyverns - massive winged reptiles with scaled bat-like wings and razor talon claws hanging from their lower limbs similar to that of eagles, hovered in waiting like a falcon before its death decent. From the torso's of these flying lizards, elongated necks emerged with snakelike heads attached to the ends.

The witch-riders stood on their flying steeds within saddle shaped like chariot stools draped around the upper back region, just before where the ostrich-like necks of the Wyverns escaped the body. All of them carried serious expressions as they knew mad scientists, despite their age, were all dangerous and unpredictable.

Tonya Powers' jetblack hair reeled behind her back from the force of flight. She stood on the lead Wyvern, wearing full Valkurion battle armor and held a staff with a glowing blue-ember on the point - just like 23 other witches on their respective wyverns.

"Surrender or be subjugated!" she ordered in a loud booming voice, as if talking from a microphone; once again holding a small sunflower in her hand.

"Why?! We didn't do anything wrong!" in insolence, Sam shouted back. "Why are you defending the rogue invasion!?"

"Rogue invasion?" asked a witch behind Tonya.

Tonya suppressed a smile. "They think that transmission was real." speaking in witch tongue, she said. "Let's give these boys a real shake down."

"Why, their intentions are pure if they believe that..." the witch stopped, seeing Tonya's logic. "They won't believe us, no matter what we tell them."

"They are called mad scientists for a reason, Natasha." turning serious, Tonya said. "They will attack."

As Tonya expected, Sam charged, giving you no choice but to follow through or lose face even though the odds were against you a million to one. The Wyvern-riders were amongst the boys in a heartbeat, as if waiting for the least provocation. The battle was over rather pathetically quickly, as you had darkly predicted. The mad-scientist boys were just that - children and were overpowered in short order by the amazonian women who, easily deflected any shots from the boys' technological armory as if they were mere water-sprays with a flick of their staffs, and manhandled the boys from their brooms.

You and Sam were ingenuous, but far from combat experts. Tonya took you by the collar and bodily threw you into a small jar, your body shrinking in the blink of an eye to fit right in. Once the lid was screwed on tight, she causally placed you in a mess bag situated behind her saddle. When Sam tried to resist, he was promptly turned into a petite weak 10-year old girl wearing a pink flower dress before shrank like the others and placed into a shatter proof jar. Within seconds, it was all over and your entire collective was captured.

"Great. I'm a little girl... Again." muttered Sam to Jan in a squeaky voice.

=======

"I'm confused, Lily. Was THAT it?" asked Samantha, looking into a massive glass orb standing on top of a wooden pedestal - the image inside the orb showed the scene where boys were being collected like insects by the Wyvern riders, similar to a television screen.

"I mean...they didn't even put up much of a fight! If they're captured then...how could they act as a decoy to the boarding school?"

"Dear, dear simple-minded Samantha. The boys were mere pawns. Bait. They were SUPPOSED to be captured." the red-headed Lily was busy combing her hair, paying no head heed to the events that she had started. "Now with their fellow mad-scientists in custody, the Patriach and his little syndicate will have no choice but to act if he doesn't want to lose face. Then..." she said turning with a malevolent sneer to Samantha. "..then I will finally kill the Cyclops!"

"What of Devin Bizarre, the leader of the mad science collective!?" snapping at Lilly, Samantha asked. "Did you forget the power he yields!?"

"He will not risk rekindling the Dark War by acting upon an isolated incident such as this." unconcerned, Lilly said. "By the time they all realize it was a misunderstanding, we will have obtained our objective."
11111122212122122121122.title: Venus-trap.

choices: The Patriach sides with Sir Misery
The Patriach sides with the Cyclops.
111111222121221221211221.content:
The headquarters of the Asylum-Syndecate - the leading body of the mad-scientist underground - was in anarchy. Clerks rushed around and back with stacks of papers and managers shouted into their phones to their sub-ordinates.
Each entrance to each room was guarded by a pair of "Shock-troops" on either side to prevent unwarranted entry (they wore fullbody white lab-coats like trenchcoats draped to their lower shins; their plastic gloves and boots were pseudo-military/scientific; their faces covered in either gas-masks or amber-goggles; in their hands they held Radiation-rifles with tazers attached like bayonetes to the muzzles - the cause of their name).

Amidst all this chaos, walked a strange creature with a purpose. It appeared humanoid in shape and size, but closer inspection revealed it to be nothing like humans at all. It's skin was grey-blue and its hands and feet were webbed between the appendages. Through its somewhat-transparent tight-hugging wetsuit-like attire it could be seen having gill openings at the side of its ribs and neck. It had a shark shaped dorsal fin protruding from its spine between the shoulder blades and a long, slender, cylindrical tail emanated from the sternum with thin vertical fins sprouting from the point end of the tail. Its face looked as if someone had chopped off the nose, leaving only 2 narrow slits for a sense organ.

The creature's bizarre and intimidating appearance was further complimented with it having sleek dark-blue hair growing frantically beneath its faceplate-like vizor and glowing yellow fish eyes. The most fearsome aspect of this creature was its maw: whenever it so much as grinned, twin sets of razor sharp shark teeth protruded from its flat inward laid lips, indicating to the world that it was without a doubt carnivorous. It looked amphibian in nature and sharklike in appearance.

The creature's name was Alcaidas. It was a G.I. (A Genetic Infantryman). A Genetically engineerd and surgically enhanced supersoldier with bionic-cybernetics. Bred for death; this creature's true home was the battlefield.
Currently Alcaidas was in search for its Creator: the mad-scientist whom had raised it.

It went straight to 2 Shock-troops standing idle in front of a massive metal sliding door, like 2 elevators directly opposite one another. Alcaidas held an ID in front of him to the lead trooper.
"Unit 75 reporting for Hadrian."

The shock-trooper slung his Radiation-rifle across his back on its sling and carefully inspected the ID.
"It's valid." he nodded to the second shock-trooper and together they both pulled off their black latex gloves and placed their hands on scanners which stood like keypads on the 2 sides of the barricade.

"You're good to go, freak. The council-room is the 3rd on the left." said the lead-trooper callously in a voice muffled through his gasmask. Alcaidas sneered at them both and walked past. He didn't need any directions: as a humanoid-shark hybrid his sense of smell in the atmosphere and hydrosphere was unparalleled. He could reek his Master from miles away to find him between crowds.

Opening a set of wooden sound-proof doors revealed the emergency meeting already in session. 17 mad-scientist Commanders stood in a shouting-match around a flat diamond-shaped table, voices rising with tempers as accusation and counter-accusation of incompetence flew across the room.

Alcaidas's vision rested on the figure of his Master and Creator - the Cyclops...

====

"You're a bunch of bleeding imbeciles!" screamed Visrek Kommandantur, the founder of the dreaded Frankenstein Brigade; his gleaming white labcoat's neck pulled across his mouth and bald lower head; his eyes were covered with thick pitchblack goggles. "A rescue party is exactly what we shouldn't do! If we try anything funny, then the witches will most certainly accuse the boys captured today of having been sent on some 'hidden agenda', then we'll have a fine mess on our hands!!"

"What do you suggest then?!" retorted Field Marshal Sir Misery. "Do we just leave our comrades to rot and become the sick experiments of of those hags! They are only boys! In my well-thought opinion we can not let this unprovoked outrage stand! We must-!"

"Oh Please!" spat Zack Maelstrom in heavy sarcasm, a blond blue-eyed young man, wearing a grey mobile armor suite. "Since when have YOU become SUCH a humanitarian?! You just want an excuse for invading enemy territory for profit!"

"One to speak out of his place as always 'captain' Zack! If I remember accurately one of the young scientists captured was named Sam. He is your own cousin, is he not? Quick to abandon your own family, or do you just have a short memory-?" spited Sir Misery back at Zack.

"Keep your nose out of my affairs, you fat basterd! I'm well aware that Sam was captured!"
"And yet' you'll do nothing to aid him in the least!"
"How dare you?! You wanna take this outside?!!"
"Let's!!! I'm sick of your cowardice!"

"ENOUGH!" raged a deep voice that sounded like metal girders being sawed. Alcaidas smiled; his master had spoken.

The 'Cyclops' was a title most befitting to Grand-Admiral Konrad Gears. He was a giant of a man. His leather black lab-coat draped over his shoulders, reaching all the way to the ground. His legs, or their absence, made a queer sight. The limbs from beneath the knees were missing, replaced by iron rods extending together into a fat monocycle rubber tyre. On this rubber monocycle he moved around as if standing on a one-wheeled motorized wheelchair. But Konrad's right eye was the selling piece. A red-lensed telescope similar to those of digital cameras emerged from the socket; and rotated and zoomed around frantically as if trying to take in everything at once. Often Konrad would stand idly with his left biological eye closed, while his bionic right one would stare you down piercingly till you broke down in nervousness. The red-glow from this bionic eye contrasted sharply against Konrad's dark garb almost gleamingly. One does not win a staring contest against the Cyclops...

"We can't go after those boys." said Konrad, simply. "Doing so will be exactly what Lily Void wants."
"Is that the harpy who took your eye?" asked Zack.
"Yes."

"I don't understand." Zack spoke again. "What Lily Void would gain from all this. How do you know she had anything to do with the capture of the boys?"

"Well, she's the one who imitated the fake-broadcast about the rogue witches incarcerating the girls...what was it?...Spell-blossom boarding school." replied Visrek. "Probably instigating the flight of the squad of broom-riders in the first place."

"We can't go after those boys." repeated Konrad. "'We will create a political incident. The boarding school is situated above a large Mana-mine."
Silence resounded throughout the room.

"A WHAT mine?" asked Zack confused.

"Mana. An ore of imence magical properties." explained Visrek to the less experienced Zack. "You see: the only thing separating witches from normal humans is that they are sponges of magical energy. Literally, the more magic you can absorb the more powerful spellcraft you can practice. Young witches are weaker than veterans, because they haven't learned how to absorb as much magic-forces yet. With mana, witches construct their cute little staffs and wands and spellbooks and whatever. This is because mana amplifies the potency of spells, making it less and less necessary to absorb large quantities of magical-energy to cast powerful curses and such. Witches go ballistic if you try to get between them and their sources of Mana-ore. Hence the reason why the Elite Hunters overreacted and incarcerated the mad-scientist boys today."

"So those boys are in trouble?"
"Yes." answered Konrad. "The witches will think the boys were trying an insurgency into the Mana-mine. And when the boys try to explain they were only going to save their sisters from the rogue-witches which never existed in the boarding school (all thanks to Lily Void), then the Hunters Elite will think the boys are knowingly lying and are in fact spies or saboteurs for us. If we organize an operation to forcibly take back those boys, we will only prove the witches right."

"So we just do nothing?!!!" raged Sir Misery, amonst the disgruntled murmurs of several other displeased mad-scientists, whom clearly indicated they didn't feel like letting the situation stand as it was.
"Just for now!" interjected Visrek. "Till we smooth things over with the Hunters Elite! Say Zack."
"What?"
"Don't you know this Tonya Powers - the commander of the Hunters Elite? Can't you give in a word for those boys? That they were only were only acting foolishly? You 2 had a relationship-"

Zack snorted and laughed. "Tonya HATES me. In fact: she hates the very ground I walk on!" his smile subsided into seriousness. "I already asked her if she could release the boys. She was hardheaded. Said they had fired home-made weapons on them. Therefore they as witches, bla bla bla, self-defense against psychotics and all that. So no."

"This is pathetic!!!" screeched Sir Misery. "If I'm alone to form a retalaitory strike against the Hunters Elite, then so be it! I will not stand aside while the pride of the Mad-scientist is mocked in this way!" Many scientists concurred and threatened to leave then and there out of frustration.

"If you go, you will play directly into Lily Void's hands!" shouted Konrad in defeat.

"And just what is it this 'Lily Void' of yours wants, Cyclops?!" said a wheezing sickly, coughing voice.
All eyes homed in to a fragile figure sitting in a hover chair that had just entered the room.

It was the Patriach.
111111222121221221211221.title: Diplomacy.

choices: Let's find your mom and dad.
11112.content:
As both yours and Chris' clothing were slowly transforming, a soft knock came to Chris' door, it was Sarah. "Hey, Chris, Hank's mom and dad bailed out on him again, some overseas business matter." she said, opening the door. "He needs cheering up, do you want to hit the mall?"

She stopped talking, seeing you and Chris in the room, staring each other down, your clothing changing into ridiculous outfits that did not match at all, causing her to sigh. Sarah was a short and slender girl with long blond hair, blue eyes and doll like features. She and her best friend, Hank had known about yours and Chris' powers for nearly a year and were sometimes drawn into your games. Sarah had low resistance to both magic and mad science but she did not really mind being changed in the spirit of fun. Only, she did not like the fact that they were always at each other in fear that someone less understanding would see them. "Are you two at it again?" she asked. "Can't you knock it off for a while and have some fun?"

You turned to Sarah, slightly annoyed, as Chris did the same and replied in unison, "We are having fun!"

Surprised, you and Chris looked at each other, then laughed before canceling and reversing the others transformation and shaking hands. "Pick this up later?" you asked, smiling.

Chris smiled with you. "Sure, two o' clock sound good?"

Chris rolled her eyes as Hank stepped in behind her. He was about your size but with muscles that seemed to have been carved out of stone. He was extremely athletic and had a love for martial arts. His resistance to magic and mad science was higher than Sarah's but he was easier to catch of guard as his mind was more in turmoil due to having to often live without his mom and dad.

"Were they at it again?" he asked.

Sarah nodded. "They were having a clothing duel." she replied. "They both looked ridiculous."

Hank chuckled. "Let me guess, it's wash day." he said, trying to make a joke.

Chris grinned. "Maybe I can change you into a dress for me to wear today." she fired back.

Hank's face paled slightly, causing Chris to giggle. "Relax, I can't do that with mom and dad downstairs, they'd sense it in a heartbeat as it takes a lot of energy to cast that spell."

"Besides, it's considered black magic." you added. "One tear in the dress could be fatal for you when the spell eventually wears off and you change back."

Hank relaxed considerably, though he still seemed troubled. "Mom and dad took off last night, leaving me a note that they'll be back sometime next week." he said with a moan. "Just once, I wish they'd take me with them."

You and Chis looked at each other then nodded. Sarah saw this and became concerned. "What are you two planning?"

You turned to Hank and said...
11112.title: Enter the friends.

111122.content:
"Nothing, let's go to the mall." smiling, you said.

"I have a better idea." grinning, Chris said. "The Little Sister doll company is holding tours to celebrate their opening a factory just outside of town." she turned to Sarah. "My coven and I are going to check it out, you are welcome to come along if you like, Sarah."

"Sounds like fun." smiling, Sarah said. "Only, what about Hank and Jan?"

Sarah smiled, turning to you and Hank. "I'm sure the girls wouldn't mind if two boys tagged along."

You winced, the Little Sister Doll was the newest craze among little girls and young teens. It was a lifelike four foot doll with a vast collection of accessories and a outfits to match it. Despite being five foot even, you knew that magic could change your height and appearance, making you a perfect doll. Also, you knew your sister's style of 'fun' as yours was very similar in nature. "Don't get any ideas, of trying to overpower me, sis." with a teasing finger, you said. "I too have friends, its called a collective. One scream from me and they come running."

"Then you have nothing to fear, now do you?" focusing on me, Chris said. "Look, I swear we're not always out to change you into something to play with." giving you a playful punch, she added, "You can be so paranoid at times."

"Just being cautious, Chris." smiling slightly, you said. "You would be the same way if it were reversed."

Not knowing you and Chris were only messing with each other, Hank stepped in. "I'd love to go on the tour." trying to defuse the argument, he said. "It might be fun."

"Sorry, Jan." grinning, Chris said. "You're out voted."

You sighed, though you were still smiling slightly. "We both know how this is going to end." whispering, you said.

Chris giggled a little. "One or more of us will be returning home as a cute 'Little Sister doll'." whispering back, she said. "May the best witch win."

"Victory to science." silently, you countered.

"Chris, your friends are here!" calling from down stairs, mom said.

Hearing that, you and Chris walked down stairs with Hank and Sarah following to meet Chris' coven. They were five other witches in all, each around Chris' age with mom and dad standing nearby. Dad was a tall, muscular man with hazel eyes and crew cut blond hair, a near perfect replica of you only a far more powerful mad scientist as his power rivaled magic itself. No underage witched dared challenge him directly except for mom (which is why he fell in love with her.) The young witches respected him as he too had a playful nature. "Behave yourselves, girls." with a grin, he warned. "You know the laws regarding use of power before the non knowing."

The 'non knowing' referred to those who were unaware of real magic and mad science existing, it was frowned upon to allow any such people to see us use our powers unless there was no other option or your trust in them was complete. Seeing dad wink, the girls all giggled with mom following. "That goes for the boys as well, young man." looking at me, she said, smiling. "Let's try to be gentlemen."

Mom was a tall and thin woman with shoulder length dust blond hair and ocean blue eyes, a near perfect replica of Chris only her powers of witchcraft were equal to dad's mad science. Like dad, no young mad scientist dared confront her directly, not that she minded a challenge, she too liked to play.

"We'll bring the boys back in one piece." smiling at you, Chris promised.

"The girls will return unharmed." returning Chris' smile you promised.

"Have a great time, then." waving them off, mom said.

"Tell us how everything went when you return." waving as well, dad said.

Once you and the others had left, mom turned to dad, grinning. "Do you sense mischief on the horizon?"

"Yes, I do, my dear." chuckling, he said. "Here I thought it was going to be a boring summer vacation."

They both laughed.

At the factory, you moaned slightly as you found the factory...
111122.title: A new game begins.

choices: You take the opportunity to teach the girls a lesson
You decide to run. This place is too weird
1111221.content:
It was completely empty, with not even machines to make anything. You began to feel uneasy what exactly this 'little sister doll' really was, and whether this 'factory' was a front for something more sinister.

"Whats going on?" Hank demanded you turned to Chris and Sarah, wondering what they know. slowly Chris giggled, in a way you don't like.

"I don't know, since i expected at least something here. But empty factory means...." Chris said mischieviously. You gulped, and turned to Hank. "its a trap!"

'Yes. Bro" Chris giggled. "now for some fun...." you slowly backed away as you reached for your pockets and felt for a smoke grenade. not exactly high tech, or something that screams ''mad' science', but you're found such countermeasures really mess with Chris's magic. Quickly you pull the pin.

"Yes. Some fun, but not yours" you said as you pulled out the grenade as it started to fill the room with smoke.
1111221.title: Empty, its a trap.

choices: The witches have an ace up their sleeve.
11112211.content: "You think magic is so superior. Well, lets just say that isn't an ordinary smoke grenade. One spark of magic wil affect anyone without a Y chromosome. Meaning all the females, for those here who never sat through a class of biology. Meaning us mad scientists have the upper hand." You say confident of your skills in the art of plan making. What happens next?
11112211.title: Brains beats the arcane.

1111222.content:
The factory was packed with families, escorting their daughters of various ages through the tours to see where the 'Little Sister' dolls are made. The machinery was running with barriers and security guards in place to keep the visitors at a distance from the working equipment. "I am sure all of you young ladies would love a close look at how these adorable dolls are made." said a young woman guide. "However, the machinery was not made to be 'human friendly' as it makes lifeless, unfeeling dolls." pointing to the assembly line, she added, "If one of you were to be accidentally pulled into the doll making process, you are likely to be seriously injured or worse... packed up and shipped to a toy store anywhere within a thousand miles to be sold to an unsuspecting family."

The girls all winced at that, along with a few boys who were reluctantly tagging along as the guide continued her speech. “Now, who would like to see a ‘Little Sister’ doll being made?” she asked.

“A little magic could make the doll maker process ‘human friendly’.” Giving me a slight nudge, Chris said.

“So could a little mad science.” Smiling, you countered. “However, a struggle at this point would be noticed unless you girls already set up a blanketing unaware spell.”

“That’s not a bad idea, Jan.” grinning evilly, Chris said to her friends’ giggles.

"By the way, boys, I'm Tera Morgana." said a tall, slender girl with waist length black hair and green eyes. "Yes, I am related to the real Morgana the witch.

"I'm Fawnia Merlin." said a petite silver haired girl with emerald eyes. wincing, she added, "Yes, I am related to Merlin, the wizard. He referred to himself by his last name."

You nodded as the legendary Merlin was the first person to find the link between magic and science, hence always hunted by Morgana, throwing the first sparks of the ancient war between witches and mad scientists.

"I am Viva Nimue." said a tall, raven haired girl with sky blue eyes. "I am a direct descendant to Nimue, 'Lady of the Lake' who blessed King Aurthur with the mystic sword, Excalibur."

"I'm seeing a trend here." whispering, Hank said.

He was rewarded with a light shock from a tiny, four foot girl with long blond hair and blue eyes. "I am Dolly Strange, daughter of Elvira Strange, the head witch."

"How can you be her daughter?" rubbing his sore thigh, Hank asked. "She must me anci...." he shut his mouth, seeing Dolly's face hardening. "Forget I said anything."

"My mother may have some age under her belt." smiling, Dolly said. "Only, just because there's snow on the roof doesn't mean that there isn't a fire roaring inside."

"Note to self, do not try to make her a doll." shivering slightly, you thought. "The head witch has no rival when it comes to magic."

"I am Sara Arc." said a brown haired, brown eyed girl about Chris' size. "Yes, I too have a descendant, Joan of Arc."

In unison, they declared, "We are the witches of the round table!"

You chuckled at that then froze as you realized that you and the others were dangerously close to the beginning of the doll making assembly line. "Using introductions to slowly teleport us into position." seeing you and Hank were the closest, you said. "That's a new low for you, sis." you then smiled, adding, "You're learning."

"That or your getting slow." smiling back, Chris replied.

"We can not interfere beyond this, Chris." seriously, Dolly said. "The unaware spell is up and you have them in position."

Suddenly, Chris gasped, finding herself teleported where you once were with you standing in her place. "The game is a foot, my dear sister." grinning evilly, you said. "Let's dance."

Only before anyone could make a move, a buzzer sounded and you caught the movement of a large square frame rising up from behind. In the blink of an eye, four metal clamps slapped onto your wrists and ankles. They then pulled to the four corners of the square, leaving you suspended and spread. "Hey!" shouting, you complained.

"Not my doing." surprised, Chris said.

Suddenly, you felt yourself moving and realized that, by switching standing positions with Chris, you had placed yourself on the conveyor belt and 'volunteered' to be the next doll! "NOOOOO!"

You tried to focus on using your mental powers as your hands were unable to grab any device from your belt. Only, the loud clanking of the machine made it impossible to think clearly. Desperate, you tried to call out for your collective but realized that it was useless as the unaware spell silenced your screams within its hold.

"We got to help him!" concerned, Chris said. "I'm altering the assembly line so it won't kill him, just... (giggle) make him the perfect doll."

"We'll help." smiling, Viva said. "We'll make him real pretty."

"I don't like the sound of that." backing up, Hank said.

Before he could openly protest, Dolly hit him with a spell, rendering him unconscious. "We'll have enough to focus on than to have to worry about you playing 'hero', Hank." looking at him sleep, she said.

Meanwhile, you were quickly approaching the first station of the doll making process. From the way the machinery was glowing, you knew that it was being magically influenced. "Oh crap..."
1111222.title: Getting ideas.

11112221.content:
Once inside the first station, you instantly panicked, seeing robotic pincers and clippers cutting and pulling away your clothing, quickly leaving you naked. You blushed a deep red, seeing the tour groups looking up at you, pointing and smiling at the newest dolly being made. Fortunately and unfortunately, the unaware spell made everyone see you as only a lifeless doll, not a struggling teenage boy. "Someone stop the machine!" desperately, you screamed. "Help me!!"

Alas, your voice became nothing but silence to those around you as the belt stopped at the second glowing station where you felt a strange tightening and realized that you were shrinking to the four foot height of the dolls. If you were not struggling before, you were struggling now as more robotic arms came into play and began to spray you from head to toe with an odd smelling liquid. You were completely soaked before long until fans came into play and you felt a breeze everywhere, including your scalp. "A hair remover!" gasping, you said. "I'm as bald as a mannequin!"

Watching and helping to control the transformation, Chris winced, seeing your naked, hairless body. "Sorry, Jan." she whispered, though you can not hear. "This can all be repaired, just don't freak out."

There was a reason Chris hoped you would not freak out. Magical energy and Chaotic energy (source of a mad scientist's power) were like mater and anti matter, bad things happen when they mix. Meanwhile, you were being moved to the third station where your body was then sprayed with another strange smelling liquid only you recognized it. "Chris, you maniac!" screaming, you cursed. "This is the distortion potion!"

The distortion potion allowed the wielder to change any feature, big or small, on the person it was poured on and you felt your face changing to a more feminine appearance. Looking down, you saw, to your horror, that your gender had been altered to a neuter state... just like a doll. "This is going too far!" panicking, you said. "She's trying to lock me inside a doll body and so many potions and spells, I may never break free of it!"

"His heart rate is going through the roof!" sounding a warning, Tara said.

"I sense his power rising!" concerned, Fawnia, added.

"Shit, he's going to fight!" alarmed, Chris said. "Can we hit him with a calming spell?"

"He's moving too fast and, if we miss, he may take mistake it as an attack and really freak." shaking her head, Dolly said. "We'll just have to hope Jan can calm himself down."

Unfortunately, that was not the case as you saw what looked like electronics being moved about the next station and blindly fired a full body energy blast, just as you entered the next compartment. This was used to fire a strong blast of chaotic energy in all directions, like a bomb. Unfortunately, this move 'short circuited' the magic influenced station and a robot arm shoved a small rectangular device against your throat and into it! Your skin opened, giving way, as if it were almost made of sand and the device was placed around your voice box. "Shit! What was just forced into me!?!"

You tried to speak but all that came out was, 'I wuv you mommy...'

"The doll voice box!" now in a real panic, you thought. "I must be enchanted, I can't speak with that in place!"

Then more robot arms came in and you found your eyes being forced wide open as a pair of baby blue optic lenses were rammed into place, making you see stars. Now stunned, you could not use your science until you were able to recover but the machine was not about to pause for any reason as the Little Sister doll logo was burned onto your left bum cheek with a laser, causing you scream. Alas, only doll like giggles came out instead and with your new contact lenses, no one could even see your eyes beg for mercy.

You tried to scream "NO! NO!" seeing a thick diaper, your size, coming at you but only, "Di Di" came out as the diaper was firmly secured around your bum, forcing your legs apart where you were certain you would have to waddle. "It's dress up time." crying, you thought. "Girls, have mercy!"

"As you can see, this doll is about ready for the final stages, said the tour guide, pointing right at you. "Who would like to pick out this dolly's wardrobe?"

"I'd like to pick it out, sir." came a small voice. "She's just about my size."

Through the doll lenses, you were able to see Dolly walk up to the control panels before she threw you an evil look and began to program the last stage, following the guides instructions of the clothing options....
11112221.title: The making of a doll.

111122212.content:
Dolly kept her evil smile as she hit a variety of buttons before turning to the guide, asking her something. The guide nodded then hit a large green button, causing the conveyor belt to move again. "I have a bad feeling about this." you thought.

Soon, your were back into the motions of the machinery and saw racks upon racks of doll clothing, all of therm glowing as you were drawn towards them. What happened then was a blur as you were attacked by not robot arms, working to dress up a lifeless doll but the clothing themselves! Each article hit you like a heavy liquid, covering a part of your body, then reformed itself onto me as if I had put it on myself. First a plastic pant set appeared over my thick diapers before a pink frilly pair of panties appeared over them. Next a pair of white tights with red roses formed onto your now silky smooth legs before a vest and petticoat combo materialized onto you. Your eyes widened, seeing the row after row of frilly layers of silk and lace, causing you to blush. "Please not a dress!" you tried to shout but all that came was 'Baby wuves a new dwess.'

"Right... I can't speak with that damn doll voice box in my throat." wincing, you thought. "I just hope I didn't give anyone any bright ideas."

As if on cue, a large splash of pink liquid came at you from one of the racks, hitting you with a numbing impact before you found yourself sporting a fluffy, frilly pink dress with a large red bow sash. You struggled harder, feeling the dress becoming tighter and tighter as buttons in the back were being closed. Of course, your struggles were in vain, as they were before, and you looked down to see a pair of pink mary janes onto your feet before feeling a firm push onto your scalp as a row of sand blond curls fell in front of your face. "I think its over." hopefully, you thought.

Unfortunately, it was not as the conveyor belt moved again to another station where robotic arms with air paint guns mounted at the ends came in from all directions. "Of course... what doll is complete without a pretty face." sarcastically, you thought. "Might as well get this over with."

You closed your eyes as your face was sprayed again and again in various places while you felt your nails becoming slightly heavier which meant longer nails and, of course, polish. It was not until you finally left the humiliating dool making process when a mirror appeared in front of you, sowing yourself as a Little Sister doll with a heavily made up blushing baby girl face with sand blond hair and a red bow on top. The 'dool, you, was wearing a frilly, poofy pink dress with heavy silk and lace petticoats. You blushed more, seeing that the dress did not completely cover the the pair of pink, frilly panties, plastic pant set, and diapers underneath. With white tights with red rose accents and pink mary janes, you looked exactly like a Little Sister doll, ready to be backed and shipped out.

"Would you like to purchase your new doll, straight from the factory and take it home?" asked the guide, back at the tour's end. "Or would you like it delivered to your home?"

"Actually, we would like it delivered to a toy store my friend works at." with an sweet smile, Dolly replied. "she gets a bonus with each Little Sister doll sold." speaking slightly louder, she added, "We already have every accessory that comes with it."

Hearing that, you panicked as robotic arm forced you into the doll box, wire tying your ankles, legs, wrists, waist and neck to the back of the box. "SHIT!" you thought, seeing the clear plastic lid being placed over top of you. "Damn you Christina!"
111122212.title: Dolly is mischievous.

1111222121.content:
You fumed inside your box, unable to use your hands or your voice. It was necessary to use your hands to form various quick signs and symbols that focus your mind to use the 'kinesis' or powers of the mind. It was equally necessary to use your voice to summon objects from your lab or call for help.

"Christina and her coven will feel the wrath of mad science once I free myself." darkly, you thought.

Telekinesis, the ability to move things with ones mind, would have been useful to tear you out of your box but you could not move your fingers apart enough to form the necessary hand sign that would trigger your mind to 'activate' and 'deactivate' that specific power. It was a grave truth among mad scientists, they possessed great power but to have it all at once would destroy them and that is true madness. You tried to scream out your frustration only to hear that damn doll voice giggle as if it were taunting you.

"Curse this pre-programed device!" fuming you thought.

Worry began to fill your mind as you felt the truck carrying you come to a stop. How long have you been in that truck? You lost track of time while fuming at your situation. As the back door of the truck was pushed open, you saw that it was now in the dead of the night. The driver worked with a young woman, neither you could see, as the boxes were unloaded into the store, one at a time. Before long, it was your turn and you were carried into the bright toy store where you saw the four foot dolls standing inside their boxes as you were carried towards them. Only, you became alarmed as they took you passed the main display to place you among a smaller group of 'Littler Sister' dolls before a woman came in and began to take pictures.

"What the hell!?" confused, you thought.

Once the photographer was done, the woman who had carried you into the store came into view... "MOM!?!"

Mom smiled slyly at you and the other dolls in the small group. "Welcome, participants, to Spellblossom witch school's living doll competition." looking straight at you, she said. "We chose the 'Little Sister' doll line for this contest as they are closer to the size of a normal teenager or child..." winking, she finished, "with some modifications."

"I've been roped into a living doll competition!?!" startled and disturbed, you thought. "CHRISTINA!!!"

"This competition calls for a two doll group." still looking in your direction, mom said. "Those who are entering this contest reluctantly, rest assured that you will soon have company." she then giggled. "All of you will be 'purchased' tomorrow afternoon by those who had registered you with the proceeds going to charity."

"Groups of two?" now concerned, you thought. "Who could Chris and her coven be targeting next?"

"Each 'doll owner' must take pictures of their living doll in various cute to humorous settings and situations in a variety of clothing,using all of the dolls accessories." with a slightly evil smile, mom said. "The winner will gain a one million dollar contract with the Little Sister Doll company as their 'favorite doll'." she laughed. "You will be promoting their 'real girls' line of clothing of which you will model, as girls, for the next fiscal year."

You screamed inside but paused as mom walked right up to your box. "Good luck to all of you and... enjoy being a 'Little Sister' doll."


With that, mom walked out of the store with the truck driver, whom you still could not see, before the lights in the store went out and you were left on display with the other 'dolls' waiting to be 'purchased'.
1111222121.title: In the toy store.

11112221211.content:
You continued to fume inside your box, unable to free yourself by any means you tried. The bonds holding you, like your transformation, were magically enhanced and would not give an inch. Finally giving up after an hour of struggling, you dozed off, wondering if any of the other 'dolls' had any choice in their participation in this competition.

"There will me massive retaliation for this outrage!" furious, you thought. the wheels began to turn in your head and the perfect plan for revenge began to form. "I am going to win this competition and then, just when Christina feels the most invulnerable, I will force a body swap on her and that upstart Strange girl so they can be the company's 'favorite dolls'...."

You laughed at the thought, this time not minding the doll like giggle as it only fueled your passion for revenge. Your doll like giggle filled the silence of the toy store until you finally fell into a restful sleep. "Revenge is a dish best served cold as it numbs the heart and chills the soul."

You woke up hours later to find that it was now early morning, judging from the amount of people walking passed the store front window and curious people walking around your display. "Why are these models not for sale?" curious, one customer asked, pointing directly at you.

"These dolls were specially built by requisition order and are waiting to be purchased by those who had them made." replied a familiar voice. behind your contact lenses, hiding your eye movement, you saw Tera Morgana, smiling at you. "See how very lifelike this model is? The one who ordered this is a stricter for detail."

"I see." raising an eyebrow." the man said. "Where can I order a special doll made?"

"There is a form you can fill out at the checkout counter." pointing, Tera replied.

After the man had left, Tera leaned down behind your box. "Its lucky for you guys that this is just a friendly competition." whispering carefully, she said. "Had this been for real, you would have all been placed on sale at a discount."

Terror filled you mind but you quickly pushed it away with your plan for revenge with additional thoughts of paying Tara for her silent taunting. "You will all be feed after you are 'purchased'." turning serious, Tera whispered. "There will be dire consequences for the one who registered you if she does not arrive before closing time as you are living beings."

Hearing that, part of me hoped Christina did not show up but that began to quickly change. With each passing hour, your feet began to hurt and you felt the nagging pains of hunger and thirst. Worse, you felt as if your bladder was going to explode into the diaper you were wearing. Only, as it was most likely magically enchanted, you guessed it could hold a lot without leaking. "How much longer does she plan to keep me waiting in this damn box on display!?" irritated, you thought.

It was just one hour before closing time before Christina finally entered the toy store with mom in tow, both smiling as they approached you. You were the last box standing on the center piece display as all the other 'dolls' had been collected and 'purchased' by other girls. "Cutting it a bit close, aren't we, Chris?" loud enough for you to hear, Tera asked.

"We had a hard time convincing the other 'doll' to play along." with a sigh, Christina replied. "We made it before the deadline and we have everything we need to feed 'Little sister'."

"I am required to remind you that your 'dolls' are living beings." again loud enough for you to hear, Tera said. "Any harm to them will mean immediate disqualification."

"She's covering her own ass." grinning inside, you thought. "Clever."

"We understand the rules, Miss Morgana." patiently, mom said. "Let's get our 'doll' purchased so we can get home."

You were then carried to check out where Tera ran the price scanner over the bar code on the front top left of your box and stated the price, which mom paid. Shortly after, you were carried out of the store to a van where mom slid your box inside then closed the doors. Once no one could see her or you, mom carefully opened the box but she did not release you from the wire ties holding you inside it. "I apologize for being so late, sweetie." quickly, she said. "Your current condition will only allow a liquid diet until we can get you settled at home for the contest."

With that said, she produced a baby bottle from a bag, filled to the top with milk. You were unable to resist as mom pushed the nipple of the bottle into your mouth. The refreshing taste of the milk and the sweet feeling of moisture in your mouth moved you to quickly suck on the bottle, wanting to get every last drop. Mom smiled, watching you drink the milk and giggled once you were finished. "Did my little baby girl like her ba-ba?" teasing, she asked. she then turned serious. "The milk is heavily fortified, its like an energy shake, we will not allow you to become malnourished so do not fear about any of that."

You began to see a slight ray of hope as mom was assuring you of your safety but you were not certain of Christina and her playful coven. As mom them replaced the clear plastic box lid, you sensed a long day coming tomorrow...
11112221211.title: The store opens for business.

111122212111.content:
The journey home was long and uncomfortable as mom and Chris constantly talked about how they planned to play with their 'Little Sister doll' as if you were not there. Again, you began to fume but kept the thought of revenge at the front of your mind so not to fall into madness.or despair. Eventually, the van stopped and the back doors were open with mom easily carrying you into the house. You wondered if it was because your modified form was so light or if mom was naturally that physically powerful. Either way, you were darkly impressed.

"At least mom is keeping this competition real." with an in inaudible sigh, you thought. "I wonder how far they plan to take this forced role-playing." Your answer came when mom carried you into your bed room. "No...."

Your entire room had been redecorated with fairy and butterfly wallpaper, covering every wall. Your clothes were gone with very frilly Little Sister doll outfits taking their place. Looking about, you saw that two rocking horses stood where your entertainment stand used to be with a large toy box next to them. In the corner, where your bed used to be was a giant crib, made for the Little Sister dolls and two giant strollers standing next to it. Everything was decorated with heavy frills and bows in shades of pink, lavender, and peach. The largest insult was another Little Sister box with another reluctant doll trapped inside. As mom brought you closer, you recognized the silently crying person. "Sarah!?!"

"Does baby Jenna like her new bedroom?" teasing, mom asked. "Say hello to your fried, baby Suzie. You two will be sharing this room for quite some time."

Mom then placed you on the other side of the room so you and Sarah were facing each other across the open closet doors as Christina entered smiling evilly. "I can't wait to open my birthday presents!" turning from you to Sarah, she said. "Can I open them tonight, mom? Please...."

"Of course, dear." giggling, mom replied. "Why don't you set up the high chairs in the kitchen while I finish here."

After Christina left, giggling, mom turned to you and Christina, looking serious. "First, I'm sorry this had to happen a day before your birthday, Jan." looking at you, she said. "I promise we will make this up to both of you."

You tried to speak but only 'I wuv you, mommy' came out, frustrating you as mom giggled. "Sarah was given the same conditions you now suffer, Jan." motioning to Sarah's box, she said. she then conjured a calendar, showing them a circled date on the next month. "On this date, next month, the contest ends and you are required to be freed from your doll forms." frowning, she added, "Any attempt to keep you that way after that will bring the rogue hunters, witch police, and the witch courts."

You turned pale to that, not that anyone could see it under all the makeup you were wearing.The witch courts were known to be a hundred times worse than a military tribunal with their zero tolerance of breaking witch law while a delicate cease fire was in place between witches and mad scientists. Mom waited for her words to sink in then caused the calendar to vanish. "Lastly, all of your belongings are safely stored away in your lab with the lock down in place." looking at you, she said. "The reason you can not use your powers is because your father is using his own power to prevent you from activating them. Rest assured, once time runs out, your powers will return at their strongest ever."

She then turned to Sarah. "I am terribly sorry we had to force you into this game, Sarah." quietly, she said. "We know the crush you have on Jan and figured this would be the best time for you two to bond through this experience." she then winked, whispering, "Your reward for your services will be your own magical talent... welcome to the witching world."

A twinkle formed in Sarah's eye, one you noticed. You did not know what mom had told her but it obviously brightened her mood slightly. Then, Christina entered, still holding her evil smile. "the high chairs are ready, mom." happily, she said. "May I open my presents now?"

"You may, Chis." smiling, mom replied. she then took her arm and pulled her very close, meaninglessly whispering, "Remember the rules of play if you don't want to lose your powers for life!"

Christina gulped then nodded before they both smiled again, slowly advancing towards you and 'Suzie'....
111122212111.title: Arriving at home.

choices: terrible but you have to eat.
1111222121111.content:
Both mom and Chris giggled heavily as they opened your box first and released you from the wire ties that had bound you in a standing position for several hours. Unfortunately, due to that, your legs were a wobbling mess and you fell onto your bum the second you tried to take a step. "Aww! Baby Jenna is trying to walk!" cooed mom, giggling. "How sweet!"

Chris laughed, causing you to blush. Anger flashed in your eyes, not that anyone could see it under the cosmetic lenses that made your eyes seem lifeless. Then, you noticed several small cameras floating in the air, capturing every moment of your embarrassing time as a doll and guessed that they would be following you and 'Suzie' everywhere. Soon, Sarah was released from her box and she found it just as impossible to stay on her own two feet, which mom and Chris both giggled at before you finally began to crawl out of the room with Sarah reluctantly following. "See how clever baby Jenna is?" teasing, mom said. "She already figured out how to crawl!"

"One month of this humiliation!?" seething, you thought. "Mom had better have something huge in mind to make up for this or I'll be raising the wrath of hell!"

Residing yourself to tolerate the girls' game, for now, you swallowed your anger and crawled into the kitchen where you found dad, giving you a bemused look. Unknown to you, he had a short conversation with Christina the day before she led you to the doll factory...

"Let's verify that all of the data had been compiled and organized the the proper order." sighing, dad said. "You wish to incorporate Juan with a Little Sister doll for an inanimate photo beauty competition?"

"It's a living doll competition, daddy." giggling, Chris had said. "Jan will be released in one month, when the contest ends but will stay a girl for a year more, if he wins, to model girls' clothing made after the doll line wardrobe."

Dad shook his head. "You must have a death wish, girl!" eying his daughter, he said. "Such an act of mischievous aggression will only lead to Jan unleashing his full wrath upon you!" he sighed. "However, if you promise me you can keep Jan and the other 'doll' under control and make this up to them enough to satisfy their honor, I will allow it."

"I promise I will keep everything under control, dear." said mom, entering the conversation. "I have plans to make this up to Juan and the other 'doll', Sarah."

"Very well." softly, dad said. "You may proceed..."

Returning to the present, dad smiled down at you. "Hello, baby Janna!" sweetly, he cooed. "Does my little baby need help into her highchair?"

Reluctantly, you nodded, not really wanting to be anywhere near the humiliating contraption. Dad chuckled, lifting you up, before setting you into the highchair seat and buckling you in. He pushed the food tray into place before you could lift your arms, effectively trapping you inside it. "There we are, is my baby girl all comfy cozy?"

I glared at dad, cursing the cosmetic lenses, hiding my true emotions, causing him to laugh. "I'm sure you must be staring after your long stay in the toy store." patting my head, he said. "Don't you worry, mommy will be in soon with your breakfast and then we'll decide what to do today."

It was then that mom entered, carrying Sarah. She had a wicked smile on her face as Chris followed with the same devious smile, eying you. "Poor baby Suzie had an accident." smiling, mom said. she turned to Sarah. "Didn't you, my darling little baby dolly?"

This brought on three good laughs, but not you or Sarah. No one could see either of you blush, due to the heavy amount of makeup on your faces or see any emotion in your eyes behind the cosmetic lenses you were both forced to wear. Once the laughing died down, mom made short work, placing Sarah into the highchair next to you. "It's time for a yummy meal, yes it is!" tickling your chin, Chris said.

With that, mom and Chris opened several over sized jars of baby food. All of the labels had been removed so to prevent you from seeing what flavors they were. This caused you to cringe as you did not know what was coming. "I hope they at least picked some palatable food combinations." eying the selections, you thought.

"Open wide 'cause here comes the choo choo!" cooing you, mom said before making train sounds.

"Open the hangar, here comes the plane!" teasing Sarah, Chris said, then made airplane noises.

Reluctantly, as you both were unable to speak your mind, you opened your mouths and accepted the unknown baby food to find it tasted....
1111222121111.title: continue.

11112221211112.content:
The first 'flavorful' bite was bad, mushy potatoes and soggy rice, the second was worse, summer squash and peas, each one lingering in your mouth. It did not take you long to figure out that each spoonful you and Sarah were forced to take in had a different flavor. The only problem was, as each flavor lingered, they mixed and made a putrid taste in your mouths. "Disgusting!" wanting to vomit, you thought. "Eating baby food is bad enough, this is over kill!"

Occasionally, you managed to make a funny look, expressing your distaste but it only made mom and Chris giggle as they were baby faces, followed by coos and giggles from the accursed baby voice box. You could only guess what they had done to Sarah to force the same conditions but vowed to avenge her if they failed to make this up to her. "Each spoonful has a different taste so baby Janna and baby Suzie won't get bored with one flavor." winking at one of the cameras, mom said. "This will make both our babies nice and strong."

Unknown to you, Sarah's baby food was laced with a potion that is slowly building a magical talent within her and the baby treatment is merely a fun way to initiate her into the world of witchcraft. For you, it was a test of patience. After what seemed like an eternity, mom and Chris were done feeding your meal but they then forced a full bottle of milk into your mouths, which you were compelled to drink. At this point, your stomach felt full and even more was starting to make it ache but you could not stop yourself from sucking on the bottle. You instantly knew magic had a hand in that. Still, the milk was washing away the bad taste in your mouth so you did not really complain. It was not as though you could anyway. Once the bottles were empty, mom and Chris took the feeding trays away, allowing you and Chris to raise your arms. "Finally." you thought. "That wasn't too bad." only, they placed the trays back into place before snapping a few pictures with a digital camera. "Oh yeah, the living doll competition requires pictures in cute to humorous settings."

After a few pictures were taken, mom and Chris cleaned yours and Sarah's face clean then finally released you both from the highchairs. The humiliation was not over yet, though. Mom, holding you, placed you belly down onto her shoulder and proceeded to burp you while dad took pictures, causing you to turn another shade of red. A moment later, a soft burp echoed from your throat, as did with Chris and you were both placed back into the highchairs before mom and Chris turned to dad. "Where do you think we should taker our little darlings today, dear?" asked mom.

"Somewhere they can get plenty of fresh air and sunshine." giggling, Chris added.

Dad chuckled. "Oh, I think I can trust you two enough to find a fair place to go." eying them, dad replied. this was the only hint he would throw. "I mean, I know how much you love your little babies."

"Well, its between the park and the boardwalk at the beach." smiling, Chris said. "Personally, I prefer the boardwalk. There are plenty of shops and people to meet."

"The park is a little more private with kid swings, a baby fun house and so much more." after a thought, mom said. "What do you think, my dears?"

She smiled, looking at you and Chris, knowing you could not speak your mind. This was infuriating you and you had no doubt it was doing the same to Sarah. Finally, it came to the toss of a coin. "Heads, we go to the park." giggling, mom said. "Tails, we go to the boardwalk."

The coin was tossed by dad and he allowed it to fall to the floor for all to see. It landed on....
11112221211112.title: terrible but you have to eat.

111122212111122.content:
"Yay!" giggling, Chris cheers. "We're going to the Boardwalk!"

"Would you be a dear, Simon and put our little ones in the car?" sweetly, mom asked. "We'll be out in a few minutes."

Dad nodded and rose one hand, causing you and Sarah to levitate out of the highchairs and come down, onto our feet in front of him. Then, with a wave of his hand, he used his own powers to force our legs to move in a robot like walk and follow him out the door to the family car. There, he placed us onto the back seat, one at a time. As he buckled you in tightly, he looked into your eyes and sighed. "Fear not, your plight will not end without reward." in a low voice, he said. then with a growl, he added, "Otherwise, it will not end unchallenged."

He then pulled away, closing the car door, before taking his seat in the front. Dad's words brought a twinkle to your eye, knowing that dad would, at least, step in if things fell out of hand. Only what was 'out of hand' to a seasoned mad scientist who had seen and, possibly' experienced it all? You turned to Sarah and saw some hope in her eyes but were still unaware of what mom had said to make her more cooperative than you felt. "Mom must have promised her something big." raising a single eyebrow, you thought. "I wonder what it was."

Presently, mom and Chris returned with a number of bags, which they stored into the car then piled in with mom driving and Chris sitting next to Sarah with me forced to take a window seat. As we drove towards the ocean, mom and dad talked in a language that was vaguely familiar but I could not put my finger on the dialect. You turned to Chris, she seemed just as confused by what they were saying. It became obvious to you that they did not wish anyone present to know what they were planning. You wanted to ask but you knew that would be impossible with your voice useless.

Minutes later, we all reached the Boardwalk. Mom found a parking place and stepped out with Chis, unpacking the two strollers that were in your room. You and Chris were placed into the strollers and tightly strapped us into them as if we were nothing but unfeeling, inanimate dolls. You winced, feeling the straps dig into your skin a little but paused as the tiny green floating cameras turned yellow. Chris saw the color change immediately and loosened straps holing you, making them go green again. "I see..." catching onto the game, you thought. "The cameras are there to monitor the events and warn the 'doll owners' when they step out of line."

This gave you a little more confidence and did not struggle as Sarah was strapped in by mom, more carefully before we were pushed along towards the long line of shops and vender booths. "Oh, mommy, look!" yelled one girl. "Its the Little Sitter Dolls from the TV!"

The mother of the girl smiled and asked if her daughter could get a picture with the dolls, which mom and Chris were more than happy to allow. As the picture was taken, you noticed that mom had conjured a copy of the picture for the contest and added it to the others. "I see she's determined to win this competition." enduring another camera flash. you thought grimly. "Only mom and Chris are more playful than this, what could she be planning?"

Your question was answered when mom and Chris pushed you and Sarah into what looked like a small storage shed behind a venders booth your your last name on the reserve name plate. Inside the little shed was far from small, it had the room to fit your entire house with room to spare. It was one of the benefits of magic and mad science. The only thing about this booth was that it was stocked with just about everything one could do to a doll to dress it up or modify it in any way. Things did not look too good. "Alright, what shall we turn our little darlings into for our little side show?" grinning, she asked. "We have all day to put on puppet shows for those passing by."

My heart began to sink again. It was going to be a long day indeed.
111122212111122.title: Tails, the boardwalk.

1111222121111221.content:
Smiling, Chris picked up two control wands for marionettes. "Let's make them 'living marionettes'." giggling, she said. "That way, we can make sure they act like real dolls."

Mom grinned herself, taking one of the control wands, and walked over to Sarah. "This is going to hurt, Sarah." you heard her whisper. "It only lasts a few seconds, though so hang on."

With that, you watched in horror as mom then levitated over Sarah and gently brought the strings down onto her. Turning to the cameras, you saw them turn from green to yellow and then a light shade of red, seeing small eye hole screws appear and drill into Sarah's joints at the ankles, knees, wist, shoulders, elbows, wrists, and neck. Sarah's eyes widened with tears running down her perfectly molded doll like face as she felt the pain of the screws driving into her skin and bone.

Thankfully, the process only lasted a few seconds and mom waved her hand, making the cameras turn back to yellow and then green as the tears vanished from Sarah's unmoving eyes and cheeks. "They will not hurt coming out later." you heard mom whisper. she then turned to Chris as she lowered herself back to the floor. "You must perform the task quickly." warning her daughter, she said. "Otherwise, we will both be disqualified."

Chris nodded then turned to you. "The same thing is going to happen to you." whispering, she said. "As you can see, its going to hurt so prepare yourself."

With that said, Chis levitated herself above you and repeated the process mom had done to Sarah. You screamed on the inside, feeling the screw drill their way into your real skin and bone before the strings tied themselves to them, making it impossible to move on your own. Your entire body was throbbing in pain and you could see the camera again holding a light red color before Chris waved her hand, causing your pain to quickly subside until it was gone. The tears that had run down your face dried up and Chris smiled at you as the cameras turned green again. "Was that so hard?" teasing, she asked. then she turned serious. "They don't hurt coming out so keep it cool."

Mom and Chis then began to sift through the clothing racks, looking for cute outfits for you both to wear while you and Sarah were left magically hanging in the air, waiting to be 'used'. "I don't like the looks of this." fearful, you thought.
