Zed shot a stream of lightning towards Ryan. However to everyone's shock Ryan charged right into it.
"Has he gone mental?!" Hayley said.

"His body is being injured. What kind of stunt is he pulling?" Ms Reed.

John smirked and said "Well whatever he's doing, he's one tough badass."

Ryan plowed right through the spell and went for a right hook on Zed as he got near him.
Juan noticed this and thought "Is that guy mad or just sick of life?"

Zed was chaught off balance by this move and Ryan dashed forward.
He grabbed Zed by the neck and quickly activated his stun grenade.
There was a blinding flash of light that consumed both Ryan and Zed's vision.

Ryan's vision got back to normal quicker, his eyes were more used to the effect after all.
Zed was weaked at this point and Ryan went on the attack.
He slashed from left to right at Zed's neck and then down the middle.

Both slashes were ignited and Zed fell backwards. Ryan had hit one of his best moves, the fire cross.
Zed grunted as he stood back up. Ryan was in his lai stance with his eyes narrowed.
"You got a lucky shot child. But I will not let you win this!" Zed shouted.

Suddenly Zed had teleported behind Ryan. In the blink of an eye his dagger was lifted above Ryan's neck, intent on ending his life.
155322121111212111112.title: Showing no fear.

1553221211112121111121.content:
The dagger was dug into the left of Ryan's neck.
Zed quickly yanked it out as Ryan fell to the floor, blood was spurting everywhere.
"NO RYAN!" John shouted in vain.

Ryan's body fell to the floor with a heavy thud.
However right as it did that a voice was heard from Ryan.
It sounded different, like a demon or being of war.
"NO THE MASTER MUST NOT PERISH!" it shouted.

Just then Ryan stood back up to everyone's shock.
The wound that seemed to have killed Ryan had sealed back up.
Juan could see that Ryan's eyes were now blood red and that a white battle aura was around him.
Also Ryan was shown to be floating just above the ground.

The 17 year old turned to face Zed and pointed his katana at him.
"I shall take control of my Master's body. Let us end the battle we had so long ago Zed. This time I shall slay you!" it shouted.

Zed smirked and said "At last a worth while battle."

"What's going on?!" Hayley said.

"Did Ryan die?" Ms Harrison asked.

"His readings are all over the scale! Ahh!" Ms Reed said as she lept back from the computer monitoring Ryan's vitals. The machine had exploded from the information it had gotten.

"I think I know what's happening." Juan said.

"What is it?" John asked as Ryan and Zed kept dueling.

"The sword that Ryan's using. It's the blade of Asura the witch hunter."

"That sword?! But I thought no one could enter the cave where it layed." John said.

"Well I think that Asura was just waiting for the right person to find the sword. When Ryan was killed the sword healed his body and took it over."

Asura was an infamous witch hunter who lived in Japan about 200 years ago. He was famous for his enchanted blade that could cut magic in half and allow him to teleport. During the old dark war Asura had gave his life to save Japan from a monster created by science and magic.
As he died he transported his soul into the blade he used and waited in a haunted cave. Ryan had braved the darkness and danger of the cave and the sword was bound to him.

Whenever Ryan entered a state of death or near death the katana would take over his body to fight for him.
And now all were in awe as Asura Ryan fought Zed mano a mano.
1553221211112121111121.title: Asura Ryan unleashed!

choices: Juan taps into his full power to help Asura Ryan.
Chris decends from the sky to aid them!
15532212111121211111211.content:
Asura Ryan lept back and sent two blade shaped shockwaves towards Zed.
He blocked them as Ryan dashed forward with a large uppercut.
Zed's sith warrior like armor was slashed in half.

Zed returned with a stab aimed at Ryan's heart.
Ryan dodged it and back filpped away.
His battle aura went brighter and he dashed towards Zed once again.
Zed attempted some sort of block, However Asura Ryan just reached his neck with his left hand and flung him upward.

Ryan lept into the air to meet Zed. He stabbed Zed mutliple times in the air before flinging him down to the ground.
Zed got up and blasted a beam of dark energy at Ryan.
The attack sent Ryan down to the ground, he did a ukemi and got back up.
"You seem to have duller reflexes Asura. You would've dodged that the last time we fought." Zed said with a smirk.

"It seems your armor has been degraded over the time since we dueled." Asura muttered, but his voice made it seem like an echo.

Asura Ryan then ran his left hand along his katana. The same white aura increased the blade's size. It was about the 2 times the size of Ryan's arms.

Zed smirked and changed his dagger to that of a claymore.
"Now this is like old times." Zed said as if he were addressing a long time friend.

"You may have survived our last encounter but not this time!" Asura yelled.

The two clashed thier blades and moved from one place to another as the elevator kept rising.
Juan looked up, he could see the sky get nearer and nearer.
"John we're getting close." Juan said.

"Okay we're coming in to pick you up. Deal with Zed in anyway you can and get the two of you out of there!" Juan said.

Juan felt his wound. It had healed up quite a bit and he felt he could stand up.
He did so and rubbed his neck then thought "Okay back in this."
15532212111121211111211.title: Carry the fight on!

155322121111212111112111.content:
Juan, although injured, knew that Zed would not go down easily. "He is going to be very difficult to control but I have no choice right now." darkly, he thought. "He's still fully rested and I need time to heal."

Asura Ryan blocked a sword blow from Zed but paused as a maniacal laugh came from Juan. Both turned to see the 14 year old stand. Only Zed showed a hint of fear as they both noticed Juan was glowing with an eerie dark light. "It's been too long since I was last released." in an echoing voice, he said. "You must have really pissed him off this time, Zed."

"Dark Juan." pushing Asura Ryan back, he said. "The boy's true madness emerges."

Dark Juan laughed. "I prefer to think of myself as misunderstood." smiling, he said.

With that, he fired a blast of dark energy at Zed. He quickly dodged it and the blast blew the elevator door off as they passed a level. Asura Ryan could hear startled screams as the people on that floor ran from the heavy flying doors as Zed charged the dark boy only to have him vanish an appear behind him, laughing. "This guy is dangerous." Ryan whispered. "Why did Juan release such a insane being."

His answer came when Dark Juan caught Zed's sword with his bare hand without a single scratch and ripped it from his hand, still laughing insanely. He then delivered an incredibly rapid series of crushing blows and kicks to Zed's body, literally sending him into convulsions before pushing him towards Asura Ryan. "I softened him up for you, old boy!" laughing, he said. "Finish him off!"

Ryan looked down at the nearly defeated Zed then turned to Dark Juan. He knew, without a doubt, that this version of Juan was much like his own evil counterpart only he seemed more bent upon hellish 'fun'. He had to make a decision and fast. "If Juan can't get this darker side of himself under control soon, we may have more trouble than Zed himself." he thought. "I only have seconds before we reach the top."
155322121111212111112111.title: Behold Dark Juan!

choices: He was in a hospital bed.
1553221211112121111121111.content:
Asura Ryan sighed. This duel was interrupted and the rival he fought ages ago was on his knees.
Alas this was not by his own hands. Rather the darkness that was housed by a child younger than his master.
"But regardless of honor I must ensure my Master's wellbeing. If I satisfy the darkness of this child then my Master can be saved." he thought.

He walked forward to Zed and said to Dark Juan. "I require his sword."

Dark Juan gave a smirk and tossed the blade to Asura Ryan.
Asura Ryan then said to Zed "You know what the warriors of my country do when they are faced with death right?"

Zed nodded and said "....The art of hara kiri..."

Asura nodded and handed the blade to Zed.
"Redeem yourself in this way to ensure your well being in the nirvana." he said.

Zed gave a smirk at this. "Heh at least it would be better than facing that boy. But they remain unaware of my cloneing machine. My soul will not reach the land of Zen. Instead it will travel to a newly cloned body." he thought.

"For now I will play along with this act. I'm done here."

Asura Ryan drew his sword and stood to Zed's left.
"I shall assist in your honorable death." he said.

"Oh come on and get it over with!" Dark Juan said bored.

Asura Ryan shot a death glare at Dark Juan. His Master nearly being killed was one thing, but mocking the culture of his land was another.
"No I must ensure my Master's safety. That is the rule that a samurai must follow with regards to his damiyo." he thought.

Zed then aimed the sword over his stomach and said "I regret nothing."
He then plunged the blade into his belly. At the same time Asura Ryan slashed down on the head of Zed.
The head that once belonged to the head of Zed was now rolling toward the edge of the elevator.

Asura Ryan looked up and could see the plane that had John in.
He then sheated his katana and muttered to Dark Juan.
"Be sure that my Master's wellbeing is secured. Else I will unleash a path of destruction, starting with you."

With that the aura of Asura Ryan faded and the 17 year old was back to his normal self.
He fell to the floor with a heavy thud, his energy totallly spent.

Dark Juan smirked and said "Well I guess I'm done here....For now."

With that Juan returned to his normal self.
John had opened the landing strip to the plane and was yelling
"Come on! We need to get out of here now!"

Juan nodded and lifted Ryan on his shoulders.
They both got onto the plane as it sped off. Leaveing the station sinking into the sea.
"Mission complete! How's Ryan?" John asked.

Juan smirked and said "He seems fine to me. He'll live."

John smiled and said "Good to hear."

He then said to Ryan's knocked out form "Thank you my friend."
When Ryan awoke he noticed that.....
1553221211112121111121111.title: Ryan deals with Zed.

15532212111121211111211112.content:
When Ryan awoke, he noticed that he was in an unknown house. He slowly sat up, seeing that he was healed then turned to find Juan, quietly working a computer console. "His condition has stabilized, John." turning to a video screen, Juan said. "The nanites did their work perfectly."

"Why didn't use just use one of Ryan's clones?" raising an eyebrow, John asked.

Juan frowned. "The first rule of all mad scientists, never play God." forcefully, Juan replied. "A clone is an individual with the same genetic structure as the original person the DNA was taken from. It has a soul..."

"You are thinking mad science, Juan." sighing, John said. "Ryan is using Mystic science. His clones are 'reflections' of himself, turned to flesh and bone." he then smiled. "Your heart is in the right place but you still know so little."

Juan grunted. "My way is still better, if you ask me." before ending the call, he said. "You can carry nanites around with you but its harder to carry another you as a whole." he then saw Ryan sitting up. "Ah, you are awake."

"How many of those nanites are inside of me." softly, he demanded.

"None." seriously, Juan replied. "I used medical nanites, they go in, do the job, then come out." he then pointed to a glass display where his katana rested. "You may claim your weapon on your way out, you are free to go."

Ryan, fully dressed in fresh clothing, got off the examination table and stared at Juan for a moment. "Why did you release that dark side of you?" curious, he asked.

Juan sighed. "I didn't, not originally." he said. "Elena Kruse separated my good persona from my evil one in an attempt to kill me. I managed to keep myself together but 'he' comes in useful in desperate situations as he does no hold back."

"I think it would be wise not to release him again." serious, Ryan said. "He's crazy."

Juan gave Ryan a death glare. "No mad scientist likes to be called 'crazy'." calmly, he said. "However, I will let that pass as Dark Juan insulted you earlier." he shrugged. "Still, like your Dark Ryan, my evil persona is someone I just have to deal with, nothing more."
15532212111121211111211112.title: At an unknown house.

155322121111212111112111121.content:
Ryan had decided that he had added his two cents. He took the blade of Asura out the case and left the room without a word.
Juan then said "Someone's here to visit you. They are waiting outside."

Ryan thanked him for that and left the house to find the love of his life waiting outside.
She was 16, with brown hair in a ponytail. She wore a red summer blouse with a cream white skirt.
The girl was grinning right at Ryan.

"Jenny?! Is that you?!" Ryan asked.

She nodded and said "Way to save the day Ryan."

He ran right up to her and embraced her.
Then he heard a loud beep from a car nearby.
"Come on Ryan!" John said.

Ryan smiled and he and Jenny walked into the car and sat at the very back of it.
"Nice day today." Ryan muttered.

John nodded as the car drove off to his place.
As they got out the car Ryan asked John "So do we have a plan for today?"

John smiled and said "Well first I'll let you meet my friends. Then we were all gonna hit the beach. Day after that and you and Juan will need to attend an award ceremony. For your actions in saving the world."

Ryan looked up at the sun and said "As long as there's no cameras."

When they opened the door to John's place Ryan was greeted by Harry.
"You must be Ryan Carlson. Nice to meet you."

"Likewise."

Megan shook Jenny's hand and said to her
"So are you his girlfriend? I'm John's."

Jenny grinned and said "Yes I am. We've got heroes for our boyfriends."

Ms Harrison then said "Okay Ryan and Jenny head on over to Harry's place and we'll meet you at the beach."

Ryan and Jenny nodded and left with Harry to get thier summer wears.
155322121111212111112111121.title: Ryan leaves.

1553221211112121111121111211.content:
Ryan had donned his old swim shorts, red with black floral patterns.
In truth he was a bit shy with regards to his body.
Not becasue he was fat or anything like that, but his torso was covered in quite a few scars.

A normal 17 year old teenager should not have any real scars, well ones that are not from things like saving young boys from thier evil witch siblings or being shot or zapped by lightning. All of that and more had been done to Ryan more times than he could like to remember.

"Jesus man. Those are some wounds you've got on." Harry said when he noticed them.

Ryan nodded and said "Hey at least it reminds me of what I'm fighting for."

Harry lifted an eyebrow at this. "Is it justice?" he asked.

Ryan shook his head and repiled "No I just fight for what I think is right. Always have and always will."

Jenny then opened her door to show her outfit.
She was still reserved on her body, so she donned a pure white one piece.
Ryan thought it was as pure as her own heart.

Jenny then gave him a nice and large grin and motioned to the door.
The beach was a good hour or so away, but it was a roasting summer day so the outfits were fine.
Ryan kept his eyes mostly down on the pavement as they went to the beach.
He could hear the mutterings of passers by, things like "Is that a scar on his heart?"

"That boy must be superhuman if he can survive those wounds."

Ryan let out a sigh, that sort of thing did'nt really help him feel better.
He felt Jenny put a calming hand on his back.
The 17 year old gave a warm smile, Jenny was the light at his tunnel's end. His voice of peace.

Harry seemed to be able to notice Ryan's dismal look and said "You okay pal?"

Ryan put a smile on and said "Not really, but it's a nice day so let's enjoy ourselves."

Harry smiled back and said "Amen to that."

Soon enough the beach was in sight and John and co greeted Ryan and Jenny.
"Ryan? Are those scars real?" Hayley asked.

Ryan bit his lower lip and said "When I got them they felt real. I think that's enough proof."

John chose to change the subject with "We got a few beds reserved for us. Follow me."

Ryan gave a smile and said "Sure thing pal."
1553221211112121111121111211.title: Continue.

choices: John, telling to come with him to see a witch trial.
Juan, they need to go to thier medal acceptance speech.
15532212111121211111211112111.content:
It was a clear summer day. One where the seagulls could be heard flying high and no clouds hiding them in the sky.
Ryan headed the beach bed that John had given him and put a large parasol over it.
Hayley and Mel noticed that Ryan was just huddled up on his bench while the rest of them were in the water.

Worried, the two of them walked up to him.
"Hi Ryan." Mel said.

Ryan nodded and said "How have you been? You know with the whole station thing?"

"I'm fine, we're more worried about you." Mel said in response.

"Yeah I saw what happened. Back when you fought Zed on the elevator." Hayley said.

"Ah my one winged angel form.....Yeah it's quite scary ain't it." Ryan said.

"You should come into the water. Relax and all that." Mel said.

The 17 year old shook his head. "I'm not really in the mood. Just going to lie here and take it easy kay?"

Jenny appeared and tapped Hayley on the back. She muttered "I can handle him."

Hayley nodded and she and Mel left Jenny to Ryan.
She got behind Ryan and said "Mr Carlson you need to relax."

Jenny then began rubbing his shoulders and neck slowly.
Ryan sighed and leaned back into the massage.
"That's it. You need to chill. I think you've earned it." Jenny said in a flirty tone.

John smiled as he saw Ryan looseing up.
"I think he's starting to be more open with us." Harry said to him.

"Yeah, something tells me he ain't really sat down and relaxed since he discovered magic." John said.

Ryan began to drift into a calmed and laid back state. Jenny planted a kiss on his forehead and muttered "That feels good don't it."

The 17 year old smirked and muttered back "It sure does."

Soon enough the time had passed and before Ryan knew it he awoke to the next day.
He heard a knock on the door and he told the person to come in. Who was it?
15532212111121211111211112111.title: Continue

choices: He shows her the fate of those she hurt.
Ryan decides to summon his friend Chon who holds hatred for evil witches.
155322121111212111112111121111.content:
"You need something?" Ryan asked John.

"Yeah I've found something that I think you'll want to see. Rather I think I need your help." John said.

Ryan put his outfit on with a dark blue trenchcoat and said "So what do you need? Door needing kicked down? Wall needing busted open?"

John smiled and said "We need to go to court, rather witch court."

Ryan groaned "So is this the part where the council accuses me of treason to save face? To hide that they can't control all people under thier reign?"

John frowned "Is that your view of them Ryan?"

The 17 year old gave a bitter smile and said "Politics don't save me when I'm nearly dead. I'm the one who makes the change in the end. But anyway let's go."

John created a portal and the two walked into it. They then saw a woman in the room next to them. She looked to be about Jenny's age and she did not look happy. "So what she do?" Ryan asked.

"She gave a lot of folks the banned doll test Ryan. Her name's Kimberly. Many guys and some girls have had thier limbs pulled off to a madness curse she put on thier doll forms. Now they are left crippled and horrified. She's in a large amount of trouble to say the least." John said darkly.

"So this concerns me how?" Ryan asked.

"I want you to get it into her mind, that what she's done is made loud and clear Ryan." John said.

"How much can I do?" Ryan said.

"The witch council has given you anything you want except her death Ryan. It does'nt make me happy but I need to you send her a message. You've been through many horrors my friend. Give her an example." John said.

Ryan nodded, without a word he entered the room and shut the door without turning his back. He then said "So you think magic can be the end all of all? That you can play god with other's people's lives? Well allow me to begin your punishment girl. I'll show you true fear...."

Kimberly quickly turned pale and awaited Ryan's move.

155322121111212111112111121112.content:
"Enter." Ryan said.

The door opened and Juan walked in with a dead serious look on his face. "We need to go to our medal acceptance ceremony and give a speech." firmly, he said. "I hope you have one written, its going to be a cold crowd."

Ryan sighed. "Code speak." annoyed, he thought. "Blasted mad scientists and their secretive ways. "You can trust everyone here." patiently, he said. "Just tell me the situation."

Juan sighed. "Its too dangerous to speak of in the open." death in his eyes, Juan said. "Elvira has ordered a suicide mission for my sister and I; she added you at the last minute."

"Perfect." sighing, Ryan said. "Let's go then."

Twenty minutes later, Ryan, Juan and Chris stood in the office of Elvira Strange at Witch Blossom girls boarding school with Devon Bizarre, the lead mad scientist sitting at her side. Devon was an aged but massive man in a black business suit with jet black hair and piercing green eyes. The very sight of the man caused Juan and Chris to wince in fear as the power vibrating from him was overwhelming. Ryan alone held firm though he too felt the man's power, it was truly impressive but nothing compared to his sword, Asura.

"Elena Kruse has seized Hell's Gate Island. It is 500 miles south of Australia." serious, Elvira explained.

"Forgive me, ma'am." raising an eyebrow, Chris said. "But no island exists in that location."

"Oh its there all right. It was a site of a major witch-scienist battle in 1905." assured Elvira. "It was a HQ for the mad scientists, chosen for its remoteness, and the witches at that time sent everything they had to capture it, with the hopes of ending the war."

"Unfortuanately it nearly ends both of us." added Devon Bizarre, the head mad scientist. "Our plan was to lure them in, and once they took the bait... "

"They released a radiation bomb equal to the Bikini Atoll tests." Elvira frowned. "They were overconfident about their own protection against radiation, and underestimated our resilience. Yes, a witch fighting under those conditions tires easily, but we had a few tricks of our own. The reminants of both forces fled."

"So you want us to head into a radioactive hellhole?" Juan demanded.

"Hell's Gate Island is the resting place of the most powerful creation of both mad science and magic." in a dead tone, Devon said. "The book of Merlin."

"T-The what!?" stunned, Ryan asked. "Do you realize the secrets held within that book!?!"

Elvira nodded. "One who possesses the book of Merlin will be able to control magic and Mad science simultaneously." in a dead tone, she said. "It was through Merlin that your sword was forged."

"In fact, it has a brother." looking at Ryan, Devon added. "It is called Excalibur."

"We leave immediately, madam head witch." bowing, Chris said.

"It would go more smoothly if I take my team in alone." cutting in, Ryan said. he turned to Juan. "No offense but I feel we are better suited for this."

"We were selected for this mission, end of story." firmly, Juan said.

"I'm still taking my team." equally as firm, Ryan said.
155322121111212111112111121112.title: Juan, they need to go to thier medal acceptance...

Ryan and his team were waiting in the large hovercraft with Juan and Chris.
"You've got quite a weird team there Ryan." Chris said to him.

Ryan smirked and said "Maybe so but I picked these guys casue they will walk to hell and back with me."

The aim was to create a male who could use magic. It worked to a good extent, however Light grew mad from the testing and escaped.
He was found and taken in by Ryan, in return he now acts as a sort of bodyguard to the 17 year old.

However after meeting Ryan she decided to open up to the other gender, to a point.
Often her role in the team was defense, she could conjure barriers that could damage the attacker.

In the rear of the team was Charlie. He was a young boy that was tortured by his rouge witch family ever since birth.
He was then saved by Ryan and Chon, as time went Charlie was able to tap into huge amounts of sheer power.
It activates whenever his emotions get really high or if Ryan and his team are being attacked.
Charlie can then foucs his emotions into his fists to do powerful feats, such as crushing rocks and even bending metal.

Alongside Ryan was his old friend Alexander, the two were friends at Ryan's old high school. After hearing Ryan needing his help he eagerly jumped into the action, using his enchanted rapier that had ice based powers he can strike right past any defense that his enemy has.

But per Devon and Elvira's request Ryan had no choice but to bring her with him. Her magic was preformed rather differently than most witches. For she is of a dying race known as the Neko, witches who are part cat and part human. So in order to use her magic she reads pages from her Grandmother's old grimoire.

"People we are nearing the stronghold in five." the Captain of the ship said.

Ryan got out of his seat to give a talk to his team.

155322121111212111112111121112212.content:
"Feeling nostalgic, Eva?" unimpressed Chon, asked. "Regressing your age to that of a teenager will not throw us off guard for a second."

Then the cloak fell to the ground, revealing not a teenage girl but two girls, no older than ten. One was standing on the others shoulders. "I am Vogue Morgana." ice in her voice, the girl on top said. "The one below me is Viva Morgana."

"We are the V twins and V spells your defeat." smiling, Viva said.

"Their mother kidnapped them again!" angered, she muttered. "The V twins are not evil, their mother forces them to do her bidding through the collar around their necks."

"Terrific." annoyed, Ryan said. "Suggestions?"

"They are just as powerful as any adult witch when they work together." gravely, Juan said. "However, they referred to themselves as rogues, meaning they are fighting the control over them." he stepped forward. "My friends have business with your mommy and granny. Why don't you two play with me... and my twin?"

The girls looked at each other as Dark Juan appeared, smiling then smiled themselves. "All of you may pass." looking at Juan, Vogue said. "We'll play with you some other time, okay?"

"Their still just kids." with a sigh, Chon thought. "Evil may have brought them into the world, evil may have laid hands on them but they are not evil themselves. Let's hope it stays that way."

"Let's move!" taking command, Ryan said. "Alexander, go with Chris. We can't have her doing her mission alone."

Alexander shared a light blush with Chris then the two ran off down a separate hall while Ryan and his team moved forward. "Do you think Juan and his darker side will be okay holding off those two terrors?" worried, Jenny asked.

"The girls are not evil." serious, Chon said. "Juan will be fine." he then smirked. "The worst I see happening is him getting a makeover."

Jenny giggled at the thought as the team pressed forward.

1553221211112121111121111211122121.content:
Ryan's team kept running past hallway after hallway. They knew the quicker they found Merlin's book the quicker they could get back home with less injuries. "All right team split up and look for an elevator. Holla if anything goes wrong." Ryan said.

Everyone nodded and broke off to search around. Chon tried a door on his far right. With a huge creak the door opened.
Chon's senses told him that nothing was there. He then stepped into the room and fell right down due to the old floorboards.
"Chon you alive?" he heard Ryan say.

"Nothing's broken. There's no way back up. I'll move on and see if I can't catch up with you." Chon said.

"Okay, good luck Chon." Ryan said.

Chon noticed a small entrance nearby. He got on his hands and knees and slowly moved forward.
He could see by hearing. From what he could tell there was a large tomb nearby that he was heading towards.
The tunnel ended and Chon fell down onto what he thought was most likely marble flooring.
He got up and used his senses to scan the room. "I can feel the heat from the torches. People have been here recently." Chon thought.

The blind man was trying his best to be quiet, whoever had lit the flames on the temple steps could still be here. But every footstep seemed to be like an echo. His actue senses told him about some latin chanting going on. His chi sight noticed several red chi witches gathered around a boy with blue chi. Chon knew that something bad was happening to the poor boy. He sprinted right up the steps and bursted into the temple.

"Sisters we have been breached. Kill the intruder!" one of them yelled.

Chon smirked and flowed his chi energy into his fists. "I was gonna say step away from the kid. But I'm having a bad day and that's worse for you!"
1553221211112121111121111211122121.title: follow Ryan's team.

choices: Chon notes that the boy looks like Juan.
15532212111121211111211112111221211.content:
Chon took in the enemy, there was about 40 of them all ready to kill him in a heartbeat. Thier red chi was like the colour of fire.
The whole thing screamed suicide but Chon did not give a damm. He had lost the only member of his family
to evil witches and he made his life mission to fight rouges till they took him out.

The blind 18 year old dashed right towards the witches as Devon and Elvira watched the fight unfold.
"So one of Ryan's team found the boy first. He does not seem to know who he has saved." Elvira said.

Devon nodded and said "I wonder how Chon will survive this. I have heard tales of his kenpo being legendary. His drive for revenge gives him extra power."

As Chon dodged the blasts. he lept into the air. With a smirk he did something that could only be called horrific.
He yanked his blindfold off to show what remained of his eyes. Everyone present, even Elvira and Devon who watching the fight all had a look of sheer horror. "My god the blood's all crusted!" one rouge said.

"It's just like a pitch black hole. But there two small ones instead!" another said.

"My lord he's walking around with an injury like that?" Elvira said.

"Perhaps it's to remind him of his revenge." Devon suggested.

Devon was right as Chon lept down and karate chopped the nearest rouge's head clean in two. As the witch fell down Chon said
"Look upon my former eyes for they're gonna be the last thing you see!"

With that Chon focused his chi energy and dashed to the nearest rouge. He uppercutted her so hard that her head stuck onto the top of the room. He then grabbed the nearest one and used her as a shield to stop many of the other rouges from attacking him. He then flung the now knocked out rouge at the group and lept into the air.

Chon came right down to earth with a dive kick that landed right on the skull of a rouge. He then wrapped the back of his right leg around the neck of the nearest rouge and quickly snapped her neck.
The blind man was then knocked back by the use of lightning. One of the rouges then fired a TG spell at him.

However the spell not only just brushed off Chon but a large red aura was around him.
"I think you just made him mad." one of the rouges said.

That was correct, Chon moved at a god like speed towards the rouge who casted the TG spell.
Devon and Elvira looked on in shock as Chon ripped out the rouge's heart and flung it in her face.
"Oh my that's very brutal." Elvira said.

Devon nodded and said "His revenge drives him to perform murder."

At this point Chon used his chi dash to zip past the spells that were being casted at him until he was in the middle of them
Chon then charged his right leg with his fighting energy and did a full 720 spin kick that took the form of blades that either decapitated or mortally wounded the rouges.

There was only a few left after this and Chon began to pant, he had spent quite a lot of energy in doing those moves and he was feeling spent. But to his good luck the rouges that were left ran in terror for fear they would be next. Chon then walked over to where his blindfold was and wrapped it around his eyes.

He then sat down and sighed among his handiwork. "No matter how many of them I kill I don't feel any different. It's only when it's ones who killed my Brother that I do." he muttered as he gazed at his hands.

Chon then noticed that the boy was waking up. The blind man used the remainder of his power to stand up and walk slowly up to the boy.
15532212111121211111211112111221211.title: 1 blind man vs 40 rouges!

155322121111212111112111121112212111.content:
Chon staggered over to the boy. He was young, about Charlie's age. Two years give or take.
"You okay?" he asked.

The boy slowly opened his eyes and said "Just resting sir. Who are you?"

"Chon Kay and I'm your savior for the day." Chon said in response.

The boy smiled and got up "The name's Arthur King sir. May I ask what you're doing here?"

"Arthur King? That's the kid we were to find." Chon thought.

"I was sent here to find you and the book of Merlin." he said.

Arthur then narrowed his brow. "How do you know of the book?" he asked.

"I think I should ask you that as well." Chon said as he sat down on the large stone table.

"It's related to my blade." Arthur said as he looked at the blade held in his right hand.

"Well I guess that's a fair reason." Chon said.

The blind man then turned on his headset and said "Ryan? Come in Ryan."

"That you Chon? Talk to me pal."

"I've found a boy and he says his name's Arthur."

"You sure?"

"No doubt. What do you want to do?" Chon asked.

"Are you hurt in any way Chon?"

"I ain't gonna lie Ryan. I got into a huge fight. But let's just say I made it a bloodbath."

"Okay find a way outta there and pull back. See if you can meet up with Juan."

"Fine but what about the kid?"

"Hey my name is Arthur." he said.

"Is he okay to move?" Ryan asked.

"No wounds on him from what I can see." Chon said.

"Okay ask him if he knows the way to Merlin's book. If he does then get him to come to us."

"Got it where are you?" Chon asked.

"Uh by a large statue of a lion with the galaxy above it. Near where you fell down."

"Okay I'll talk to him. Chon out."

Chon then turned to stare his hidden lack of eyes at Arthur.
"Kid I need to ask you a favor."

"Let's hear it." Arthur said.

"That book holds the fate of the world in danger. You need to help my friends in finding it." Chon said.

Arthur said "I work alone pal. Others only slow me down."

Chon then banged a fist down and said "Arthur listen to me, this is not about good old macho crap or anything like that. This is about survival and victory! Now you can either help us or I'll drag you back to the mainland. Your choice."

Arthur thought about it and said "Well when you put it like that. Alright let's move. I know a way out that can take us to where we need to go."

Chon nodded and the two walked out the temple to see a small winding path that went in two ways. One left and one right.
"You take the right one to get out of here. I'll go left and meet with your team. I overheard your talk with that Ryan guy." Arthur said.

"Got it. Take care and good luck." Chon said as he walked off to see how Juan had got on with his duel.
155322121111212111112111121112212111.title: It's Arthur King.

Juan finds Alexander and Chris fighting a rouge.
1553221211112121111121111211122121111.content:
Chon felt tired, like he had done laps around a field for 3 hours non-stop. With a grunt he forced his body to travel forward.
"C'mon can't quit. Not now." he muttered to himself as he opened a door near the main entrance hall.

He saw Juan sitting on an old table, he seemed to be wiping his face to get rid of some makeup that got onto him.
"Where's Ryan and the others?" Juan asked Chon.

"Somewhere else. We got split up."

Chon then noticed that the V twins that Juan had fought were knocked out and they were sitting upright on two chairs.
"We had a tea party. I laced the drinks with knockout mix." Juan said.

"Classy. What now?" Chon asked.

Juan got off the table and said "I think I've regained enough power. I'll head towards Chris and Alexander, see how they're doing."

"What about the kids?" Chon asked.

"You seem to be heading out. Why not take them with you. They deserve better." Juan said.

"Juan....How old are they?"

"About ten years old. Why?"

Chon picked the two girls up one in each arm. He kicked the door that led to the hovercraft. He then turned to Juan and said
"These girls are the same age as I was when I lost my only family. 8 years later and look at me now, unable to see right and lusting for revenge."

Juan decided he should say nothing to it and went after Alexander and Chirs. Chon left and got onto the hovercraft.

15532212111121211111211112111221211111.content:
Chon entered the hovercraft and placed the two girls gently onto a couple of seats.
He then asked for the pilot to put Elvira and Devon on the line.

"Mr Chon are we feeling well?" Devon said.

"Tried and puffed out sir, Ryan ordered me to pull out." Chon said.

"I see you have two new people in your craft. Care to explain?" Elvira asked.

Chon sighed "I've brought the V twins with me for a reason."

"I assume it's to do with thier Mother?" Devon said.

"Yes, that and.....I remember when I was the same age as they are now." Chon said with gritted teeth.

"The death of your Brother, Chung. I remember dueling him, he had courage and hope in his heart. He died a hero Chon." Elvira said.

"I know.....But look what's happened to me. I can't even see normally and I hunger for vengance. Magic tore my life apart." Chon said.

"Chon I do not wish to sound rude but could you tell us why you have brought them with you?" Devon said as he looked at the camera that showed Ryan's team.

"Okay I ask that I may take the two girls to learn at Starmage Academy. I would look after them as my Brother did for me. In doing so I hope that magic may not destroy thier lives like it did for me." Chon explained.

Elvira smiled and thought "You have one heck of a younger Brother Chung. You would be proud."
She then said "Very well Chon you may take the V twins into your care. I'm sure Ryan won't mind. You shoud take those collars that they are wearing. Good luck."

With that the screen vanished and Chon noticed the two girls were waking up. "You're that blind man!" Viva said.

"Did we lose to that guy? He said his name was Juan." Vogue said.

Chon nodded and said "Juan took advantage of your own habits. But listen I wanted to ask you something."

"Okay." the two of them said.

Chon stood up and went near them. "I've heard about your story. I came to offer you a new start."

The girls said nothing and Chon went on with "Come with me to the UK. I learn at a place where all are equal. You will live with my kind hearted fellows. What I'm asking is...Can I look after you both?"

".....Do you mean it?" the two girls said.

Chon nodded and said "I've never told a lie. Is there anyway I can prove it?"

Viva said "Can you take our collars off?"

The blind man smiled and said "Hold on." he then used some of his chi to gently tug the collar off both Viva and Vogue.
They rubbed thier necks and looked at Chon in shock. The two girls had tears rolling down thier faces.

"We thank you..." Viva said.

"For this second chance!" Vogue cried out as the pair wrapped thier arms around Chon.

Chon was a bit shocked, he could'nt remember the last time he'd ever been hugged. Sure he had touched people before.
Shaking hands with Light killer, being carried by Ryan when Chon was ever wounded. Slapped by Amy during one of thier talks.
Even touching witches to inflict his killing kung fu.

But being hugged, that was a long time ago. He sighed and thought "I could used to it." the blind man returned the hug and muttered
"It's over now. Your new life will start soon. Forget about that old life, it's going to be okay."
15532212111121211111211112111221211111.title: A heartwarming moment.

"We need to get to Ryan's team. They need backup." he said.

Juan said "Let's move, Ryan has a tracker on him. It will show us where he is."

The team dashed through the castle, past empty room to empty room.

Everyone fought tooth and nail to fight the Elena clones.

Four of them swooped down over Amy, intent on lopping her head off.
Amy smirked and placed her hands on the floor. A large barrier went around the girl.
The Elena clones landed on it and were zapped to hell. As thier dust blew away Amy used her left hand to pull some hair strands back.

Light Killer, known to many as John Doe charged towards several of them. He stopped as he neared them, he then sliced his left wrist with his right hand to place his blood on many of the clones. He then smirked as the blood he spilled onto them turned to acid that melted away thier bodies. Another tried to sneak up behind him, only to have her neck sliced by Light's claw like hands. The wound that Light made on himself quickly healed up thanks to his powers. All the while he grinned in glee.

Jenny held her Granny's diary tight. Flipping into the pages she said "And as the danger loomed over me, I brought forth blades made from blue flames to hunt my foes." When she said that small blue colored swords were over Jenny's head. They then flung themselves into many directions and impaled several Elena clones to the wall.

With a large battle cry he chucked it at the rouges. A few were hit and the rest went nearer. Charlie started to have flashbacks to when his Sisters would torture him with their powers, namely zapping him with electricity. He began to cry and rushed right up to the two rouges and nailed both of them in the gut. They went flying into a nearby wall and Charlie snapped out of his state.

Ryan and Arthur were in the middle of the room, back to back. The clones were attacking from all directions.
"You ready?" Arthur asked him.

The 17 year old grunted in the afirmative and the two began to rapidly slash through all. The spells the clones casted, the clones themselves.
Thier blades tore both skin and bone as they slayed all that attacked them. Ryan wiped his blade clean from blood and sheated it. Ready to fight in the lai stance.
"Not bad Mr." Arthur said.

"You can sure handle a blade kid." Ryan said in response.

At this point there were only a handful left of Elena's clones. Alexander said "I've eyeballed the real one." Alexander was born with perfect eyesight due to magic. He could study a person's fighting style and find holes in it to attack. That's why he was undefeated in fencing duels.

"Where is she?" Juan said glad he could stick it to the evil Woman.

"The one who's limping. She's used so many clones it's given her a small injury!" Alexander said.

"Got it, Bro shall we?" Chirs said.

Juan nodded and the two shot fire and ice at the real Elena.
"I will not be beaten here!" she said as she countered with her clones alongside her.

Just then she felt a pain in her belly and looked down. Alexander's rapier had stabbed her in the back.
Elena fell down and Alexander wiped his blade and said "For an infamous witch, you went down rather easily"

Chirs secretly winked at him and said "Nice move Alexander. You know human anatomy or something?"

Alexander smiled and said "A bit, to help in any situation."

Elvira and Devon smiled as they watched over the whole thing.
"It looks good so far. I wonder what Ryan will do next?" Devon said.

"Well they still need to find the book of Merlin." Elvira said.

"Alright someone tie her up." Ryan said.

Chris summoned some rope and wrapped it around Elena so she could not escape.
"I swear when I free myself I will kill you all!" Elena cursed.

"The only thing you're gonna be doing is telling me something useful." Ryan said as he neared her.

He then drew his blade and placed it close to Elena's neck. The light coming from the roof opening gleamed from the blade into her eyes.
Elena tried to move out the way however Ryan held her head with his left hand. "Get you hand off me." Elena said.

To prove his point Ryan took his blade and placed it to just below Elena's kneecaps. "I'll start from here and work my way up. And it'll just hurt more and more. If you want to do something about it then tell me the right things and we'll go from there."

Elena said nothing to that and Ryan said "Okay then here's the 50 million dollar question. Tell me where to find the book of Merlin."
Again nothing. Ryan smiled and said "We know you're here for it. Last chance before my attack."
Nothing, "Suit yourself, just remember this hurts you a lot more than it hurts me." Ryan said as he plunged his blade into Elena's right knee.

Elena screamed in agony. Asura's blade was enchanted to deal extra pain to those who were evil of heart. Even though there are no records of it, Asura would often use the same sort of method that Ryan is using now. Maybe that's why it's so effective.
Ryan let the blade out and said "Wanna talk now?"

"Hah a child like you cannont hope to use it." Elena said with panting breath.

Ryan said "Don't wanna use it. I'm sure you put a lot of blood, sweat and tears into trying to find it. Here let me add some more to that."

Alexander muttered "Don't look dear." to Chirs.

Juan nodded and said "For once I agree with you." Ryan actions reminded him of Dark Juan all too well. Juan and Alexander gently turned Chirs away from the sight.

Ryan yanked the blade out and aimed it to Elena's belly. "Get this wrong and you're child bearing days are over. Tell me where the book is!" he yelled.

Elena said as she tried and failed to get movement in her legs.

Ryan stood up with an uncertain look on his face. Elena was sweating bullets and said "You got what you wanted! Take me and haul to the jail just don't hurt me anymore!"

Elvira and Devon watched what Ryan would do, would he either pay evil onto evil and slay Elena? Or would he follow the path of good morals and arrest her. This would affect if he would pass his test or not. Ryan then.....

Ryan discussed the event in his mind. The good in one of his ears and the evil in the other.
"Do the world a favour!"

"No, kill her and you're no better than her!"

Ryan saw through the glass window that was the elevator doors. He went on a smilar elevator during his mission on the space station about two days ago. But now was no time to ponder the past. Ryan would need to work with a kid who he'd just met and find the book of Merlin.
"We got a plan after we pick up the book?" Ryan asked Arthur.

Arthur nodded and said "Yeah we just pick up the book and just ask it to teleport us."

"Is that it? I thought you were gonna say 'Nah we're just going to wing it as we go." Ryan said.

"Well we're gonna have to do that to get to the book. But there is a straight path right to the book. Won't be easy though." Arthur said.

The elevator then showed the center of the earth. It had large streams of lava flowing around below large rocks. At the far end of this from thier elevator they could see a book that was sure to be the book of Merlin. Ryan drew his katana and Arthur drew his blade. Both swords glowed. "Our previous wielders knew each other it seems." Arthur said.

"No doubt they must have dueled in the past." Ryan muttered.

"Reckon we could do that?" Arthur asked.

"Don't think so kid. You ain't my foe so you ain't my problem." Ryan said.

Let's just say that the things that Ryan's done in such a short year, any normal starmage student would be tried in court and jailed. But Ryan gets results in the end, so no one could complain.

"Okay this is it." Arthur said.

The doors slid open to reveal an intense amount of heat. Ryan could feel sweat trailing down his brow. "I thought we would be cooked chicken in an instant." Ryan said.

"The power of our wills and blades are what's keeping us safe Ryan. Don't let your blade go no matter what." Arthur explained.

"Understood, let's do this." Ryan said in a quiet tone, he would survive this he was certain. All the good things he'd done were not for justice.
It was for Jenny and his own belief. His belief in what was right.

1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.content:
As Ryan and Arthur traveled across the rocky path that loomed over the lava Ryan noticed someone.
"Ah dam. Why did you have to show up?" he muttered.

Sitting on a large rock not too far from them was Dark Ryan. The black suit he wore was unharmed by the heat, his red cat like eyes danced with madness. "You know him?" Arthur said.

Ryan drew his blade and said "He is me. Don't hesitate kid, do so and it's all over!"

Arthur nodded and the two drew thier blades. Dark Ryan grinned and stood up. He gathered a surge of dark energy in the palm of his right hand. He lept off the rock to join Ryan and Arthur in the air. The dark side of Ryan conjured a shield to block both heroes sword swings.
The shield burst and sent the two of them back to the path.

"That's some energy he's got. So that's you're real dark side? Must have been bad when you still had him in you." Arthur said.

"Kid you don't know the half of it." Ryan said.

Dark Ryan had a grin plastered onto his face as he ran towards them. He snapped his fingers and a bolt of dark energy went between Ryan and Arthur. They dodged it and Arthur said "Watch and learn Ryan." He then conjured some power into his blade and sent it towards Dark Ryan in the form of a blade.

The dark side took it and was nailed into the rock path. However he sat up and started laughing. "What the? How can he be joking about this?" Arthur said.

"The guy loves pain and suffering. But if he takes too much he'll bog off." Ryan responded.

Dark Ryan sat up and dusted his suit. He smirked and conjured a blade made from dark energy into his right hand.
Both Arthur and Ryan ran towards him. The duel was like that of two jedi vs a sith. Dark Ryan kept stepping back with each attack that Ryan and Arthur made, however he kept up a smirk on his face.

Arthur was quickly nailed in the jaw with Dark Ryan's elbow and Ryan was slashed across the gut. As the 17 year old fell to one knee Dark Ryan prepared to attack the stunned Arthur. He clicked his fingers and summoned someone that Ryan knew.

"No not her!" Ryan yelled.

The person Dark Ryan summoned looked like Jenny. With dark hair and a pitch black dress.
The two of them smiled and stood back to back, they then quickly took out pistols and were about to shoot Arthur.
1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.title: Dark Ryan was sitting waiting for them.

1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.content:
Time slowed as Dark Ryan and the evil Jenny pulled the triggers of thier guns.
Arthur smiled, a single drop of sweat dropped from his brow as he went for his sword ala Henry Fonda going for his guns.

The blade he wielded turned bright blue. The bullets were fired and Ryan was about to yell in horror.
However Arthur blocked all the bullets in quick and fluid motion. Ryan could just about make out the bullets falling harmlessly to the rocky path. Dark Ryan and Dark Jenny's guns were dropped and Jenny vanished, her purpose done.

Arthur laughed and said "Really thought you could kill me with a gun huh?"

Dark Ryan smiled and dashed forward. Normal Ryan lept back up and entered his lai stance.
Arthur and Ryan's swords clashed with the right arm of Dark Ryan. Who then grinned and formed a barrier of evil intent as a shield.

The two heroes lept back, wondering thier next move. "That's one bad dark side!" Arthur said.

"Tell me about it. Maybe the two of us can send him packing?" Ryan asked.

"I think I have a idea."

"Let's hear it kid." Ryan said.

"How about a combinded slash attack? Like a perfect x or something like that?" Arthur said.

"That's so classic kid. We might as well casue I don't see no other option." Ryan said in agreement.

The two heroes then did a quick fist bump and got ready. If anyone had told Ryan two years or so ago that this was where his life was going to head. That he was to travel to Asia to learn how to fight, to join a school for magic and those who hunted the evil casters. Not to mention fight alongside a kid to fight his Dark side in the center of the earth. Well he would think that person was a nut job.

"Too late to think about that now." Ryan thought to himself.

"So full power?" Arthur asked.

"Hmm. How about just under that?" Ryan found himself saying.

"Fair enough pal. So how are we going to open him up?" Arthur said.

"Just hit him. I've fought him enough times to know that he loves pain. Too much and he'll run." Ryan told him.

The two charged thier blades up with a large amount of energy. Dark Ryan started laughing and just stood there, daring them.
Ryan and Arthur then sped forward, Ryan was a red blur and Arthur was blue. They dashed right past Dark Ryan with perfect form.
They both sheathed thier blades, a colored trail following them that went right past Dark Ryan. He moved in the air like he was being slashed by a powerful blade. He finally vanished in a cloud of dark smoke, a laugh was his last heard sound.

"Whew again that's one bad dark side you got." Arthur said wiping his brow.

Ryan said nothing, he sheathed his blade and pointed off to the distance. "That's the book!" he yelled.
There it was, covered by a sliver bubble was the book of Merlin.
1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.title: Arthur smiled and got serious.

1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.content:
As the two boys neared the book the lava behind them gave a loud beast like roar.
"The hell was that?!" Ryan said.

"Must be the guardian of the book!" Arthur said.

"Aww you gotta be joking! Why did'nt you tell me that earlier?!" Ryan said.

"You never asked!" Arthur said.

Ryan would have put a hand on his head and groaned if they were not in danger.

Instantly a large beast made from the lava appeared behind Ryan and Arthur.
It gave a loud roar and spewed lava from it's mouth. The two heroes drew thier blades and slashed multiple times to
divert the lava away from them.

The beast realised it was pointless, Ryan and Arthur sheated thier blades and Ryan said "Screw this!" he then grabbed Arthur's arm
and the two ran towards the book.

Merlin's guard landed in front of them and lept at the two of them.
Ryan and Arthur slided forward, thier blades entered the so called skin of the beast.
It gave a roar then paused as the two stood up.

"Ah I see....You are the two who are to find the book. I can feel your power and I'm impressed. Do as you please." it muttered as it fell back into the lava.

"Whew I thought that was going to be a real boss battle there." Arthur said.

Ryan sighed and said "Thank God for plot weapons." in a deadpan tone.

With that the two neared the bubble. Arthur stopped Ryan and said "We must show we use the blades."
Ryan nodded and the two stabbed thier swords into the bubble, it popped and the two neared the book.

"So is this it?" Ryan asked.

"Well were you expecting some sort of bad dramatic scene where we journey to the end of time or something?" Arthur asked.

Ryan groaned and said "Kid really? You've watched too many movies."

Arthur shook his head and said "Will you do the honor my friend."

The 17 year old nodded quietly and reached out for the book, slowly he held in his hands. He could feel the power coming off of it in waves.
Arthur then said "Oh book of Merlin guide us to safety for we are the wielders of the rightful blades!"

The book shined brightly and engulfed the two of them. They found themselves in......

1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.content:
Ryan fell face first onto hard wood, it was not the first time that happened to him.
He got up and shook his head to clear the cobwebs, his sight noticed he was back at the office of Elvira.
"Well done Mr Carlson. You have performed very exceptional." she said with a smile.

Ryan stood up along with Arthur. "Were you watching us?" Arthur asked.

"Yes we were." Devon said. "We saw it all, the moral choice you made Ryan and the actions of your fellows."

"I should've known, but whatever." Ryan said.

"So where are the others?" Arthur said.

"On their way back. Now let's rate your performace Ryan." Devon said.

"You showed great decision making in important moments, as well as great skill in combat. Your leadership is also top notch and you've got a great sense of morals. In short you did optimum performance and that was expected, after that incident in the space station." Elvira said while looking at a piece of paper.

Ryan sighed and said "What now?"

"Arthur you stay here with Devon. Mr Carlson why not....."

1553221211112121111121111211122121111121.content:
"A what?" Ryan asked.

Elvira smiled "I said there's a fan club about you Ryan. Many of the school here have heard about your exploits, no one has been able to wield the asura blade ever since the master put his sprit into the blade. A large group of girls view you as some kind of superhero."

Ryan lowered his gaze "I've never felt like a hero."

"Care to explain?" Devon asked.

The 17 year old sighed and said "All of this, I never asked for it, I didn't ask to be some sword toting action hero. Or a kung fu master, that or be involved with a world that involves stuff like this. I just wanted to be normal."

Arthur put a hand on Ryan's back and said "My friend many people in this magic based world never asked for their powers, they were given to them. But there's always a choice, you either walk away from the fight. Or you face it and do what's right."

Ryan turned and said "I know that dammit." he then sighed and said "I used the past tense, I'm too deep into this to turn back. And besides, if I were normal then how would I help Jenny? Or Chon? Or Charlie?"

He then ripped his shirt off and said "I ain't exactly dressed to meet girls am I? My whole body is covered in ash."

Elvira waved her hand and the ash went off, she then handed Ryan a plain white shirt. "Come, walk with me Ryan and take your mind off the matters for now."

Ryan nodded and donned the shirt, he and Elvira left the office and walked down the steps.
"You know Juan has a girlfriend here." Elvira said with a smile.

"Really?" Ryan said.

"Yes, he's very protective of her." Elvira said as they walked to the school grounds.

Ryan could hear girls whispering past him. "Look at the abs on him!" "Is that a katana on his back?" "Don't wanna mess with that handsome devil."

Elvira led Ryan to a classroom and said "Welcome to your fan club."

The room was filled with many girls, aged 15 to 18 all clapping in joy. Balloons and confetti flew everywhere.
"Hello there Mr Carlson." said a 16 year old in a rather flirty tone.

"Now now Kirsty, he's already taken." Elvira said.

".............." Ryan was silent as he took in the crowd.

"Well Ryan say something." Elvira said.

"I.....Hello. Sorry if I'm rather out of it, I just came back from embarking into the center of the earth to find a magic artefact. But hey what else is new."

The fan club stood in awe. "You were in the center of the earth?!" "Was it hot?!"

"Now now girls, any exact details are entirely confidential." Elvira said as she put a hand on Ryan's shoulder to reassure him.

"Well we made a cake for you. If you're hungry then you can have it." a girl called Erica said to him.

Ryan let out a smile "I could do with something to eat yeah. Thank you."

The cake was a large one with pink icing on top of it. Blue icing wrote "Asura's wielder."

The 17 year old felt happy, cracked lips let out a smile and a laugh escaped his neck. "I guess being a hero can be rewarding." he muttered.
Ryan took a hand and ripped a large part of the cake into his mouth. He felt content with who he was.

"Perhaps there is no meaning to the universe. But it's the people that give it their own." Ryan thought to himself.

"I guess so, I just don't want to let it all go to my head." Ryan said in response.

"True, arrogance and overconfidence is the greatest of foes. Speaking of which...." Elvira said as she neared a classroom.

Ryan sighed and said "Let me guess, someone needs knocking down."

Ryan cracked his knuckles and said "They can be thankful that it's me they're dealing with and not Chon."

With that Elvira walked into the room with Ryan, his eyes noticed a group of about 5 girls. All of them looked at him with disdain.
"Well look what we have here, an older boy." one girl said.

"Yes Violet, here's here to teach you a sort of lesson if you will." Elvira said as she nodded to Ryan.

Ryan stepped forward and said "I'm gonna teach you a lesson in manners you ain't gonna forget."

"Oh really? Get him Tonya!" Violet yelled out.

The girl called Tonya quickly fired a TG spell at Ryan, however it merely just placed some small glitter onto Ryan who promptly dusted it off. Ryan then drew his katana and stabbed it into the floor. "I don't need to use Asura on weaklings like you." he said.

"Now remember Ryan, you just need to scare them." Elvira muttered.

"That's easy, evil doers are cowardly and superstitious at core. I just need to find what makes them afraid and act upon it." Ryan muttered.

Seeing Zed poised for the kill, Juan gave a mental command. *Lab, augmentation!* This was a desperation move that supercharged the mad scientist's body, returning him to full strength. The only draw back was it carried a risk of injuring the physical body as well as the brain. This move was a scientific equivalent to dark magic.

Seeing Juan's body suddenly spark with an overload of energy, he knew what he had done and quickly ducked as Juan sent forth a powerful lightning blast into Zed. He screamed and convulsed, his blade falling to the floor before Juan loudly stated, "Lightning bomb!"

Only, before they hit the ground, Juan pulled his fist back and the pieces reformed into Zed who soundlessly fell to the floor. Ryan and Juan entered the helicopter that awaited them, both of them entered without speaking a word. That is until Juan spotted his Sister "Chirs!" he said as he gave her a hug.

She returned it and said "Thank God you're okay, who's the big guy?" she looked at Ryan as she said that.

Ryan sat down and said "The name's Ryan, the sorry sap that got dragged into this. Shame you weren't there, the whole job would've gone much quicker with an extra hand."

He then checked his watch and said "John it's Ryan, the mission is complete. Did Mel get out okay?"

"She did Ryan, thank you." John said with a warm smile.

"Things I do for people......" Mr Carlson thought to himself.as he turned his head to look at the vast ocean below.
His mind wandered to Jenny, the love of his life. Heck he was in the US and she'd be in the UK. He didn't know much about time differences to know what she'd be doing though.

"Hope she's okay, she keeps me going." the young man thought to himself.
15532212111121211111221.title: Ryan's mission is over, what now?

155322121111212111112211.content:
Ryan kept silent as the helicopter flew away from the sinking base that was the space station, several witches and mad scientists were flying away. Mr Carlson had a small worry that they may hunt down this helicopter, but he figured they had some sort of cloaking device that made it certain they wouldn't be found.

"You okay Ryan?" Juan asked him, patting him on the knee.

The young man looked at him and said "I'll be fine, let's just get out of here. Eager to start my holiday proper."

Juan gave a small smile "Ryan, I thought you were just some rookie who didn't know what he was doing. But now....I think I envy you a little, the way you acted, like you're a natural at it. John does know how to pick em." he thought to himself.

After gods knows how long the flight was the helicopter landed at last. As it did so Mr Carlson's eyes went wide as he saw who was there. She was 16, English and he knew who it was. "JENNY!!!!" Ryan yelled out as he flung the helicopter door open and lept out of it, stumbling a little as he did so. He rushed towards her and embraced her.

"What did you think I was going to let you have a nice holiday in the sun without me?" his girlfriend asked him.
Ryan said nothing, Jenny was his moral chain. His reason for fighting, it wasn't about truth and justice for Ryan. It was Jenny that he fought for.

Ryan then noticed other people coming out to the helipad "Chon! Light! Amy! Charlie!" he said as he made his way to them with Jenny.

"Saved the day?" Chong asked with a grin on his face.

"You needn't have done that Ryan, I would have gladly done it for you." Light Killer said with a nod

"You know one day you're gonna fight something that's as stubborn as you are, but that'd be rare." Amy said with her hands on her hips.

"When are the bad guys gonna learn that they can't beat you?" Charlie said with a smile.

Ryan could only give a sigh, he had to admit. Sometimes it did feel good to be the man who saved the day, if only sometimes.

"C'mon Ryan, the witch council leaders and science council will want to talk with you. Same with me." Juan said as he motioned for Ryan to follow him.

Ryan held Jenny's hand as he pushed the door open, a bright light blinding him for a brief moment before he saw several witches and scientists clapping him. Jenny gave a squeeze to Ryan's hand to get his attention, the young man turned to her. She smiled and said "C'mon Ry, folks need heroes. To give them hope. So smile would you?"

Ryan sighed and nodded, turning to the crowd. Smiling and waving as best he could in his semi-wrecked body limit.
Chon could tell Ryan was hurt, the blind man often had several injuries himself alongside the young man.

Mr Carlson limbed a little as he approached Elvira, who was applauding him and Juan for their efforts in preventing the destruction that the space station could have inflicted upon the earth. "Mr Carlson you achieve the impossible yet again, it seems like nothing can destroy you."

"I'm hard to get rid of." Ryan responded, motioning to the enchanted katana that was strapped to his hip.

"Amen Brother, I had my doubts about you. But I think they are safely dashed, guess we picked right for this op." Juan said with a pat on Ryan's back.

It earned a wince from Ryan, he motioned to his lowed body and lo and behold. A rib was jutting out his body ever so slightly, earning an annoyed grunt from the young man.

"You might want to get that looked at." Light muttered to Ryan.

The young man nodded and responded with "I'm not bleeding out the mouth so I reckon I'm alright for now, Madam witch I'd like to hurry this ceremony up if that's okay." making a motion to his rib with his eyes.

Elvira nodded and said "Very well." She then turned to the crowd and said "Ladies and gentleman, we have gathered here to celebrate the victory achieved for justice. Juan will you please step forward?"

Juan did so and Elvira pinned a medal to his chest "For your heroic actions in the face of adversity we, the witch council and science council bestow the medal of light. The highest honour that can be awarded, congrats."

Juan bowed and made his way to a seat in the crowd, Ryan moved forward an Elvira delivered the same speech with the same medal. She made sure to place it on the side of the chest that didn't have the rib jutting out.

"Understood madam witch, come with me Mister hero." the medic witch said, Jenny glowered a little in response to the words Mister hero. But Ryan motioned for his team to follow him, he was alone this one time. But he knew that each member of the team would take a bullet for each other.

15532212111121211111221112.content:
It had been a long two weeks of recovery but Ryan was refreshed and ready for action as he was wheeled out of the witch hospital to return to his normal routine. Only he sighed seeing Elvira Strange waiting for him near a long black limousine. "We need to talk, Mr. Carlson." Seriously, she said. "I fear I have another mission for you."

Albeit reluctantly, Ryan stepped into the limo with Elvira following. "What is this mission?" he asked.

"We have reason to believe that Juan Smith is attempting to make his own version of your fantastic Katana sword." Handing Ryan a set of papers, Elvira said. "Only he intends to trap his dark personality inside the sword, freeing himself from all evil thoughts and temptations."

"What!?" Startled, Ryan asked. "Certainly Juan knows better than that!"

"Juan is only half the person he once was." With an air of sadness, Elvira said. "Before he was forced to split himself to save his sister, his power would have surprised you." She sighed. "If Juan succeeds, he will fall completely into madness much like the original Dr Jekyll when he created Mr. Hyde."

"What if he fails?" Morbidly curious, Ryan asked.

Elvira frowned. "Then Christaun will born and it will be permanent."

"Does Christina know of this?" Worried, Ryan asked.

"We are keeping Christina in a safe house to further prevent this from happening." Serious, Elvira replied. "However you know better than most that distance will not be much of a factor when powerful magic and mad science are involved."

"What must I do?" Serious, Ryan asked.

"You will have three chances to stop this, Ryan." In a dark tone, Elvira said. "Juan can be stopped by one of three methods. Prevent him from forging the sword which will require both magic and mad science; stop him from enchanting the sword with an infusion curse and event, again needed magic and mad science; or infuse Juan with his dark persona so he will be whole again and not need the sword at all."

"Neither one will be easy." Sighing, Ryan said.

"Use whoever or whatever you must to stop Juan from destroying himself." Opening the limousine door, Elvira said. "We all need the lighter and darker halves of ourselves to make us whole."

Ryan nodded and left the limo. After it drove off, he turned to Jenny who ran up to him with a concerned look on her face. "Ryan, are you okay?" she asked.

"Yeah, I'm fine." Managing a smile, Ryan replied. "I just got another mission."

Jenny sighed. "So soon?" Wincing, she asked. "You just got out of the hospital."

"Tell me about." shaking his head, Ryan said. "It seems as if Juan is tired of his darker self and wants to seal it away."

info.brief_description: A talented brother and sister discover a war between witches and mad scientists.
info.description:
You may play one of the following characters:

Juan (Jan, for short.) A fourteen year old boy with dust blond hair and hazel eyes. He is very talented in either Mad Science or Sorcery. (You decide which.) He loves to play tricks on his twin sister, just to drive her crazy.

Christina (Chris, for short.) A fourteen year old girl with shoulder length dust blond hair and ocean blue eyes. She is very talented in either Mad Science or Sorcery. (You decide which.) She loves to play tricks on her brother, just to annoy him.

Simon Smith (Father) 35 years old. A tall, muscular man with hazel eyes and crew cut blond hair. He seemingly has no knowledge of the twin's talents, even though he keeps a 'sharp' eye on them.

Elvira Smith (Mother) 34 years old. She is an older version of Chris. She also seemingly has no knowledge of the twin's talents, she also keeps close watch on them.

There are options to play other characters (to make things interesting) just remember the theme of the story, a talented brother and sister discover a war between witches and mad scientists. The character you choose or create must have a sibling. Back to the main option...

Jan and Chris have two best friends, Hank Patton and Sarah Reed. (both are 13 and live next door.)

Ms Dr. Lucy Reed (Sarah's mother) is the Smith family's doctor and childhood friend of both Simon and Elvira, her husband died of mysterious reasons.

Harry and Emily Patton are both explorers and adventurers and leave for weeks, if not months at a time, leaving Hank in Lucy's care. He and Sarah see each other as brother and sister. There had been many talks of adopting him due to his parents' apparent lack of responsibility.

You may add new characters as long as they work with the plot of the story.

Jan and Chris are constantly trying to out wit the other with their magical or technological high jinks, while keeping their parents from finding out. Occasionally, they playfully challenge each other to a 'friendly' duel, Most end in a stalemate, which keeps them after each other, sibling rivalry.

The two work very hard to help protect the other's secret from both their parents and the outside world. That is until, one day, the brother or sister, (or both), discovers that someone is trying to draw his(or her) sibling into an ancient war between witches and mad scientists.

Are the two siblings destined to fight each other in combat? Will one try to save the other? Will the two join forces and try to escape the war? Or will something completely unexpected happen? Your choices will decide their fate.

Here are a few rules:

1. No sudden killing of the two main characters or their parents, I ask that if you do kill off one or both siblings that you work up to it first. Other characters, OK, this is a war, after all.

2. Transformations of any kind are welcome, in fact, I encourage them! Gender change, shrinking, age regression, whatever, GO FOR IT! Just bear in mind the talents of the two children, they MUST be able to change themselves back... eventually.

3. NO sibling on sibling or underage sex of any kind!! It will be deleted immediately!!

4. PLEASE be a little descriptive in any battle scenes that might occur.

5. New Characters are welcome. Create friends, neighbors, teachers. They can be witches, mad scientists, normal people, etc. Just please, NO characters from Anime... Keep this original.

6. Try to write chapters that are at least four lines long or more.

7. HAVE FUN!
